Name: Caribe Hilton
Description: The ever-iconic Caribe Hilton is situated on a 17-acre tropical peninsula with a secluded beach, near the Old San Juan historic district and a variety of top attractions. When you arrive at Caribe Hilton, you will find more than just a place to stay -- it is a place to come alive. With 652 recently renovated rooms and suites to choose from, discover a vacation that is as comfortable as it is memorable. Relax in a private beach cabana, learn to scuba dive or take a dip in our multi-tier oceanfront pool complex.

Name: Doubletree by Hilton - San Juan
Description: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Juan is located in the popular Condado area of Puerto Rico's capital city. This modern, full-service hotel offers a wonderful balance of relaxed comfort and warm hospitality conveyed by a signature warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie on arrival. Stay within walking distance of sandy Puerto Rico beaches and casinos. Our beautifully decorated San Juan, Puerto Rico hotel's location is ideal, just three miles from the historic district of Old San Juan and only five miles from San Juan's Luis Muñoz Martin International Airport (SJU).

Name: Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa
Description: Set on a half-mile of private beach, amidst 20 acres of tropical gardens, Copamarina Beach Resort & Spa is the epitome of an elegant tropical hideaway.

Name: Courtyard by Marriott Isla Verde Beach Resort
Description: Splash, relax and have fun by staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Isla Verde Beach Resort, a beachfront hotel in Isla Verde, Puerto Rico. Courtyard offers the ideal destination for escape and adventure, near many beaches and Old San Juan. It's the perfect accommodation whether you need to work or rest. A great place for family vacations, couples getaways, friends’ reunion, wedding destinations, business trips and much more.

Name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Juan - Hotel & Casino
Description: Enjoy your stay at Embassy Suites by Hilton San Juan Hotel & Casino in beautiful San Juan, Puerto Rico. This all-suite hotel is located in Carolina and it is only minutes from San Juan's international airport. The hotel is just two blocks from Isla Verde Beach and features a tropical free-form outdoor pool and waterfall surrounded by lush foliage. Our spacious two-room suites have a private bedroom and separate living room with a dining/work area. The living room features a refrigerator, microwave, wet bar, a sofa bed, and a TV in every room.

Name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Dorado del Mar Beach Resort
Description: Discover the rich history, culture, arts and natural wonders of Puerto Rico while at our Dorado Del Mar beach resort. Our resort is located 21 miles minutes from Luis Muñoz Marin International Airport (SJU), just outside the bustling city of San Juan. Steps from the beach, relaxation, fun and local adventures are all within reach.

Name: Meliá Century Hotel
Description: Discover a sophisticated world of culture, fashion, and lifestyle! The City of Ponce is a Caribbean oasis of art and architecture, a museum under the stars that becomes an iconic urban model of international caliber by celebrating historical preservation with a unique Boutique Hotel as its epicenter: MELIÁ Hotel Meliá begins a new era after 122 years of continuous operations, making this legendary monument of sophistication, the oldest Hotel in Puerto Rico, since 1895.

Name: Courtyard by Marriott San Juan Miramar
Description: Conveniently located in the heart of San Juan-Miramar District across the Condado Lagoon, with immediate access to main highways, the Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport, Hato Rey business district and Old San Juan. Excellent facilities will allow our guests to be comfortable and productive. Our Hotel offers a variety of packages for all travelers: business, leisure or just a pre-cruise stay. We strive for understanding our guests business needs providing them with the essential amenities that will ensure their satisfaction.

Name: Hotel El Convento
Description: Located in the heart of Old San Juan, old world charm and elegance meet contemporary comfort in this Small Luxury Hotel of the World. Within walking distance of world-class museums, historic landmarks, and vibrant nightlife. Access to El Convento Beach Club, featuring beach and pool privileges at our sister properties, located on the best beaches in Puerto Rico. The Hotel also has complimentary high-speed Internet access, in all guest rooms and public areas and a daily complimentary wine & cheese, serving a variety of wine and hors d'oeuvres at La Veranda Terrace.

Name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Juan Resort
Description: Nestled in the Isla Verde area of San Juan, Puerto Rico, the Hampton Inn & Suites San Juan hotel is five minutes from Luis Muñoz Marin International Airport (SJU) and steps from Isla Verde beach. The hotel is located in the vibrant Isla Verde district, near Old San Juan and numerous historic sites, restaurants, nightlife, museums and shopping.

Name: Wyndham Grand Rio Mar Rainforest, Beach & Golf Resort
Description: Golden sands, turquoise waters and tropical breezes abound this oceanfront resort, fresh from a multi-million dollar renovation introducing new exciting experiences, plus three sparkling beachfront pools, incredible dining with nine restaurants and lounges, lively casino, relaxing Mandara Spa, two world-class golf courses and more awaits. This resort is the idyllic retreat for any occasion, whether you yearn for a Caribbean golf getaway, crave an oceanfront escape, or you and the one you love need a little time under the sun and stars, there's no place like Puerto Rico.

Name: The Condado Plaza Hotel
Description: This stunning oceanfront hotel in the heart of the Condado District is currently undergoing an extensive renovation. During this renovation phase, thank you for your patronage and loyalty as we enhance our hotel for your future enjoyment.

Name: TRYP by Wyndham Isla Verde
Description: A unique, stylish lifestyle brand, TRYP by Wyndham offers contemporary, boutique accommodations in the world's most vibrant cities. Just footsteps from the beach, TRYP by Wyndham Isla Verde's location positions guests amid sensational dining, shopping, sightseeing hot spots and premier entertainment. It also features a diverse collection of expansive specialty, ocean-view rooms, equipped with free Wi-Fi, large flat-screen HD TVs and a wealth of modern conveniences.

Name: Rincon Beach Resort
Description: Discover one of the most intimate and serene oceanfront resorts in Puerto Rico—Rincón Beach Resort. Nestled on the Bay of Añasco in Puerto Rico’s west coast, Rincon Beach Resort is the perfect escapade for relaxing days under the sun or enjoying an unforgettable dining experience. The west coast of Puerto Rico, known as Porta del Sol, is home to some of the world’s best beaches and surfing areas. The town of Rincón, known for its beautiful sunsets, was highlighted in The Beach Boy’s unofficial surfer’s anthem “Surfing Safari.”

Name: Royal Sonesta San Juan
Description: Welcome to the Royal Sonesta San Juan! It is our pleasure to receive you here in sunny and gorgeous Puerto Rico. The Royal Sonesta San Juan is superbly set before two miles of white sandy Isla Verde Beach yet convenient to the historic Old San Juan, the Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport, and the financial district. With 398 newly renovated guestrooms including 22 suites, the Royal Sonesta San Juan captures the exotic and pairs it with the resorts signature sophistication, making it easy to mix business with pleasure.

Name: El Conquistador Resort - Puerto Rico
Description: Perched on a 300-foot cliff overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea, El Conquistador Resort, is a peaceful oasis on the Island of Enchantment currently offering 368 rooms and suites, growing back to its 750 room footprint by 2025. Our luxurious Puerto Rico resort is divided into five villages, providing a soothing getaway from the stress of the world. Enjoy spectacular, panoramic ocean views at The Grand Hotel in the villages of Las Brisas.

Name: Fairmont El San Juan Hotel
Description: Following a $65 million redesign, Fairmont El San Juan Hotel blends modern tropical splendor with old-world elegance. With a long rich history, the hotel continues to be one of the Caribbean’s most desired retreats. Situated on two miles of pristine oceanfront, along Isla Verde Beach, Fairmont El San Juan Hotel is an oasis of 388 guestrooms, suites, Banyan, Pool and Ocean Villa rooms, coupled with over 30,000 square feet of event space, complete with sophisticated detailing.

Name: Hotel Rumbao, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Description: Because location does matter! Only branded hotel in Historic Old San Juan District. Located within walking distance of historic Old San Juan and its vibrant nightlife, this modern hotel is designed in the charming Spanish colonial style. Conveniently situated across from the cruise ship terminals, Hotel Rumbao offers 245 deluxe rooms and suites, along with a fine dining restaurant overlooking the bay. The hotel features 9,851 sq. ft. of versatile meeting space, including two ballrooms, board, and breakout meeting rooms.

Name: Hyatt Regency Grand Reserve Puerto Rico
Description: Embark on an unforgettable beachside retreat at our upscale resort hotel where we believe that "Doing Nothing Means Everything " during your getaway. Nestled within the El Yunque rainforest, our family-friendly resort allows you to craft your ideal escape. Take leisure to new heights as you lounge by our expansive lagoon-style pool or tee off on our Tom Kite-designed 18-hole championship golf course. When it is time for reconnection, our Rainforest Spa awaits.

Name: Hilton Ponce Golf & Casino Resort
Description: Located only 5 minutes from downtown Ponce, known as "The Pearl of the South", and 10 minutes from La Mercedita Airport, this 80-acre oceanfront resort has everything you need for an unforgettable stay – elegant rooms and suites, first-class dining and facilities for business, relaxation, and recreation. Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport is also only 90 minutes from the resort.

Name: San Juan Marriott Resort & Stellaris Casino
Description: The San Juan Marriott Resort & Stellaris Casino is a AAA Four-Diamond oceanfront hotel that focuses on customer service and cultural experience. Located in the heart of Condado, guests don’t have to leave the premises to appreciate the beauty of the beach, situated just a few feet away. Visitors have a variety of over 20 restaurants and stores within walking distance to do some fine dining and shopping.

Name: The Ritz-Carlton San Juan Hotel
Description: Let one of the most elegant San Juan luxury resorts, The Ritz-Carlton, San Juan awaken your senses as you fall under the spell of its enchanting rhythms and flavors. Our casual yet elegant luxury hotel envelops guests in a timeless Caribbean setting – perched on a two-mile stretch of a golden sandy beach. Puerto Rican fritters, mamposteao rice and mofongo introduce adventurous palates to the local cuisine. Rum flights find their way on to afternoon agendas. And the percussion-driven beats of bomba and plena enliven the atmosphere with Puerto Rico’s beloved musical heritage.

Name: Villa Montaña Beach Resort
Description: Villa Montaña Beach Resort, a full-service resort offers optimum personal attention to their guests, to the hotel and to the environment. The villas have been ideally situated on this twenty-six-acre property to ensure privacy and serenity. The abundance of green areas, overflowing with blossoming tropical plants, accentuates the sense of harmony with nature that permeates throughout Villa Montaña Beach Resort. The goal is to provide guests, visitors, and resort residents with an elegant, tranquil and luxurious atmosphere while maintaining a friendly and informal setting.

Name: Holiday Inn Express San Juan
Description: Spacious, newly renovated rooms in exclusive Condado. Complimentary continental breakfast, swimming pool, 24 hour store, mini gym and business center. Five minutes from historic Old San Juan’s museums, El Morro fortress, ship docks, restaurants and shopping outlets. For business or pleasure travel, our friendly staff will make your stay a pleasant one.

Name: El Canario Lagoon Hotel
Description: This is a small European-style hotel with 40 a/c rooms, private bath and balcony. They also have cable TV, continental breakfast, and international newspaper. It's only one block to beach, restaurants, hotel casinos, and much more.

Name: Fajardo Inn
Description: It is the ideal place for your vacation, wedding, seminar, retreat, or business meeting. We’ve got what you need: diverse lodging options with single rooms, family rooms and even apartments with full kitchens. All of these lodging options are available at an affordable rate. The surroundings make them even better: our attentive service and magnificent setting include lush tropical plants, an extensive vegetable and fruit garden and more.

Name: The Wave Hotel
Description: Just a short walk from the white sandy beaches of Condado you will find The Wave Hotel. A modern urban hotel conveniently located that offers locals and tourists a whole new option of urban relaxation while the alternatives to enjoy the full-on experience of Puerto Rico. Get a view of it’s rooftop with breathtaking views of the Condado Lagoon and the vibrant Condado City offers a breath of fresh air while enjoying cocktails from their incredible bartender at Sunset Rooftop, sunbathing or just relaxing in their whirlpools with powerful jets for even deeper relaxation.

Name: Hotel Miramar
Description: Intimate small 48 room hotel located in Miramar, San Juan's residential section. Located a short walk from the main business district, shops, theaters, and beaches. Completely refurbished rooms with A/C, kitchenettes, cable TV, telephone and In-room safe. Our front desk will be happy to help you with directions, recommendations, general information, or calling a taxi. We can also help arrange guided tours, excursions, car rental and special services. Our front desk is staffed 24 hours every day so we're always ready to help!

Name: Costa Bahía Hotel & Convention Center
Description: At Costa Bahía Hotel and Conference Center, we’re committed to providing a relaxing experience from the moment you arrive. Whether you’re visiting Guayanilla, Puerto Rico for business, leisure or a little of both, our convenient, contemporary and affordable hotel merges personalized service with resort-style amenities. If you should need anything during your visit, our welcoming staff is at your service.

Name: ESJ Towers Hotel
Description: Máre St. Clair Hotel, part of the St Clair Collection, is a beachfront resort is located on the beautiful Isla Verde Beach— just five minutes from the San Juan Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport and 15 minutes to Old San Juan. Shopping, dining, casinos, and must-see attractions are just minutes away.

Name: Hacienda Siesta Alegre
Description: Spanish colonial-style hacienda, open-air (chalet, private residence), with a breathtaking view overlooking Puerto Rico’s north coast from a hill high in the rain forest. Located about 35 minutes from San Juan, 15 minutes from the Rio Mar and 30 minutes from El Conquistador.

Name: Holiday Inn Ponce & Tropical Casino
Description: Stay at the Holiday Inn® Ponce & Tropical Casino Hotel and discover the beautiful city also known as ‘The Pearl of the South’. Enjoy peaceful mountainous surroundings and gorgeous views to the Caribbean Sea while being minutes from downtown Ponce. Our location off Highway 2 grants business travelers easy access to Mercedita Airport and El Tuque y Reparada Industrial Park. Also convenient for leisure guests, we are near the main attractions of the city.

Name: Verdanza Hotel
Description: Verdanza Hotel is an independent property located in the heart of Puerto Rico’s Isla Verde district, just a block from the best urban beach that boasts over a mile of gold sand, shopping, and nightlife.

Name: Caribe Hotel
Description: From the moment you arrive, you will find yourself immersed in a beautiful Spanish architecture, surrounding a lush tropical courtyard. We are conveniently located just minutes from Ponce's business district as well as its tourist attractions. Hotel features include a pool, whirlpool, exercise room, restaurant and pool bar. Our guest room features include cable TV, hairdryer, iron, data port, coffee maker and complimentary supply of Puerto Rico's finest mountain grown coffee.

Name: Four Points by Sheraton Caguas Real Hotel & Casino
Description: Four Points by Sheraton Caguas Real Hotel & Casino is just a short drive from downtown San Juan where you will find everything you are looking for whether it's breathtaking mountain views or our tropical outdoor pool. We offer easy access to all the best things to do in Caguas and many major corporations. We're the perfect Caguas hotel. At our Caguas hotel, we'll make your stay smooth and easy with our casual ambiance and comfort. Settle in after a long day of fun, business or both.

Name: Holiday Inn Mayagüez & Tropical Casino
Description: An elegant well-lit lobby welcomes you to the Holiday Inn® Mayagüez & El Tropical Casino Hotel conveniently located to explore the city and discover Porta del Sol region. Have fun in the sun at Boquerón Beach or Rincón Beach, and enjoy the different festivals the city has throughout the year such as the Mango Festival or Porta del Sol Culinary Festival.

Name: La Concha Renaissance Resort
Description: La Concha offers stylish amenities right in the heart of the entertainment capital of the Caribbean and the Condado district. Enjoy San Juan beachside days, warm ocean breezes and hot nightlife. Hang out by lively pools or lounge under the wind-sculpted palm trees hugging the ocean. Enjoy exotic and local flavors at one of the hotel's chic restaurants or sip a yummy island cocktail while spending time amongst its plush bar and lounge scene.

Name: Condado Vanderbilt Hotel
Description: An ultra luxury hotel from day one, the Condado Vanderbilt shone for its beauty and magnificence, attracting the kind of guests envisioned by Mr. Vanderbilt. From the richly appointed surroundings to the unsurpassed cuisine and highly personalized service, the only standard that applies to Condado Vanderbilt is that of absolute perfection. Now restored to its original grandeur and welcoming guests once again, the Condado Vanderbilt Hotel showcases 4 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and wellness center, two 11-story towers, including Commodore Suites and Biltmore Suites.

Name: Sheraton Puerto Rico Resort & Casino
Description: Situated in the heart of San Juan's vibrant Convention District, just steps away from Distrito T-Mobile and the Puerto Rico Convention Center, this property distinguishes itself as an urban resort and a premier meetings and convention venue, earning its place among the top hotels in the capital city. Featuring 503 modern guest rooms, over 38,000 square feet of state-of-the-art meeting facilities, seven diverse culinary experiences and, a variety of leisure activities including a shuttle service to the nearby beach and historic Old San Juan.

Name: The St. Regis Bahia Beach Resort & Golf Club
Description: In the romantic setting of a Caribbean coconut plantation, nestled between a lush national forest and the sparkling sea, our resort combines elegant tropical luxury and our iconic St. Regis Butler Service: it is paradise perfected.

Name: Comfort Inn & Suites Levittown
Description: The Comfort Inn & Suites® hotel in Levittown will get you rested and ready for anything. They're merely minutes away from Old San Juan. You’ll find plenty of other local sites, activities and attractions to explore near their pet-friendly hotel in Levittown, some of which include: Plaza Las Americas Punta Salinas/Blue Flag Beach Bacardi Distillery Cataño Ferry to Old San Juan They cater to both vacationing tourists and business travelers alike with complimentary services and amenities such as: Free WiFi Outdoor pool

Name: Ponce Plaza Hotel & Casino
Description: Ponce Plaza Hotel & Casino is an independent hotel located in the historic district of the city of Ponce; Puerto Rico’s second largest city. It is right across from the “Plaza Las Delicias,” where you will find many of Ponce’s most emblematic buildings; the beautiful Cathedral of Our Lady of Guadalupe, a charming firehouse dating back to the 1800s, many monuments, museums, and shops. You will enjoy a mix of architectural styles and discover the history of downtown PONCE, also known as the “Pearl of the South.”
Street Address: Cll. Reina Esq. Méndez Vigo y Unión

Name: Ciqala Luxury Suites
Description: CIQALA Luxury Suites is a smoke-free property. Dining facilities at the hotel include a restaurant. A rich, complimentary breakfast is served each morning. The hotel boasts a 24-hour front desk service. Public areas at CIQALA Luxury Suites are comfortably air-conditioned. Hotel guests will appreciate the welcoming services of our multilingual staff. Other hotel amenities include tennis court(s). Other services: concierge desk, elevator/lift, roll-in shower and tours/ticket assistance.

Name: Casa Castellana Bed & Breakfast Inn
Description: Rediscover Puerto Rican Hospitality... at Casa Castellana Bed & Breakfast! Let us welcome you to the first authentic Bed & Breakfast in San Juan. Built in the 1920's, Casa Castellana has been renovated and turned into a lovely Caribbean getaway without sacrificing the original beauty and architecture. The quiet and homey atmosphere makes it a perfect destination for a romantic weekend, business or convention visit, a family reunion, a vacation with good friends, or for a nice opportunity to explore the island before departing on a Caribbean cruise.

Name: Dorado Beach, A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
Description: Once a plantation, Dorado Beach, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve is now one of the most exclusive Caribbean luxury resorts in Puerto Rico inspired by the legacy and memorable vacation experiences of its original developer, Laurance S. Rockefeller. Its remoteness, discreet individualized service and deep respect for the environment distinguish it from other ultra-luxury resorts by allowing extraordinary moments to unfold in the most unexpected ways.

Name: O:live Boutique Hotel
Description: Inspired by the "Art de vivre", O:live Boutique Hotel presents a unique style of relaxed luxury and intimacy. Its prime location and artistique atmosphere makes this charming boutique hotel part of the small luxury hotels of the world.

Name: Condado Palm Inn SanJuan, Tapestry by Hilton
Description: We are located in Condado, the entertainment center of the Caribbean and the best place to relax and get in touch with everything Puerto Rico has to offer. Casinos, Restaurants Beaches and a unique atmosphere that surround The Condado Palm Inn San Juan, Tapestry Collection by Hilton. Counting with an easy in and out access throughout the Magadalena Street, guest can go on there way, quicker for business / leisure tours.

Name: Hyatt Place - Bayamón
Description: Located in the heart of Bayamón, Hyatt Place combines style and innovation to create an unparalleled experience for guests. From complimentary breakfast to spacious guestrooms, our enticing array of services and features meet the needs of business and leisure travelers alike. Enjoy free hotel-wide Wi-Fi among tasty features like our Grab 'n Go case and Coffee to Cocktails Bar.

Name: Hyatt Place - Manatí
Description: Escape into the island mindset at Hyatt Place Manatí, a modern hotel with tropical flair along the north shore of Puerto Rico. El Trigal Plaza mall is a five-minute walk across the street, and our central location allows guests to decide their day on a whim. Hyatt Place is a different kind of hotel designed around our guests. We are located off exit 48 on Jose de Diego Expressway PR-22, at the intersection of PR-149 and PR-2. We are minutes from top medical facilities and growing medical tourism district as well as shopping and dining options.

Name: Hyatt House San Juan
Description: Discover the Caribbean from Hyatt House San Juan. Located only minutes from historic Old San Juan and the lively Condado District. Experience local gastronomy, breathtaking beaches, and fall in love with the many reasons the locals call this place home. For your convenience, the property has free Wi-Fi, free breakfasts, and more. Studio and One-bedroom Suites also include a fully equipped kitchen. Whether traveling for 1 night or 1 month, guests can enjoy the comforts of home at Hyatt House San Juan.

Name: Hyatt Place - San Juan
Description: Engage in a delightful lodging experience at Hyatt Place San Juan. Spacious guestrooms feature plush Hyatt Grand Beds and such high-tech conveniences as free Wi-Fi and remote printing. A wide array of hotel amenities include a complimentary full American breakfast buffet, 24- hour fitness center, outdoor swimming pool, and 3,000 square feet of meeting and event space. World of Hyatt Points available for participating members.

Name: AC Hotel by Marriott San Juan Condado
Description: AC is an elegant European lifestyle hotel for the modern business traveler. Situated in the heart of lively Condado district, convenient to the area's best restaurants, attractions and nightlife and steps away from the beach. Whether in business or pleasure, AC San Juan delivers a sense of moment and tranquility, of excitement and color that will enhance your stay in Puerto Rico.

Name: Condado Ocean Club
Description: An exclusive ocean-inspired, adult only, boutique hotel designed to welcome guests with charm and charisma! A modern oasis in the heart of the city, embracing our local lifestyle and connecting our member-guests to authentic experiences and off-property adventures. Guests enjoy posh amenities and stunning floor to ceiling views in the comfort of 96 beautifully detailed water view sleeping rooms. Designed to be uniquely social, located in the epicenter of the buzzing Condado district of San Juan, the hotel leaves today’s modern traveler with nothing to be desired.

Name: Área de Acampar y Recreación Guavate
Description: This campsite is located inside the Carite State Forest. The facilities include BBQ's, picnic areas, reserved spaces to set up tents, as well as a recreational area that is only two minutes by car from the camping area and picnic areas.

Name: Bosque Estatal Aguirre Área de Acampar
Description: The Aguirre State Forest is a mangrove forest with bird-watching spots, and nice walking paths where you can travel through and fully enjoy the essence of the forest. The facilities include gazebos, showers, sidewalks, boardwalk, camping areas, floating dock, kayak area, composting toilets, among others.

Name: Campamento Don Alí
Description: Camp at the shore of the Tanamá river, only minutes away from the Ceremonial Indigenous Park of Caguana! The cost is $10 per night per person, and if your group has 15 people you can separate the space exclusively for your group.

Name: Charco Azul Picnic Area
Description: The Blue Puddle is a fresh-water swimming hole (river) located within the Carite State Forest. There is no cost to visit this river, but you do need a permit to camp there.

Name: Bosque Estatal de Guajataca
Description: The Guajataca State Forest is located in the northwest region of Puerto Rico. The facilities count with hiking trails, gazebos, bathrooms, parking, recreational areas, among others. Camping spaces are available, but they must be separated in advance through the Puerto Rico Department of Natural Resources. Prices per night for adults is $4.00 and prices for children younger than 10 years old is $2.00.

Name: Finca Puerco Suelto
Description: Farm dedicated to agro-cultural purposes; tourists can take walks through the farm and mountains, as well as set camp in the designated camping area.

Name: Hacienda Negrón
Description: The Hacienda Negrón has swimming pools, a camping area, bar, restaurant, apartments and much more... Camping price for one night per tent is $25, plus $5 per person with a maximum of 6 people. If you're planning to stay more than one night, the price is still $25 per tent, but $3 per person with maximum of 6 people.

Name: Lago Garzas
Description: Lago Garzas is located in Puerto Rico's central mountain region, in the coffee-producing town of Adjuntas. This man-made lake was constructed in 1943, and its waters are used for the production of drinking water and as a source of hydroelectric power. The lake has recreational facilities for visitors that wish to go boating, kayaking, fishing, or hiking. A favorite with locals is finding the Puente Hamaca, a suspension bridge that crosses over the lake— making it a great photo-op opportunity. There's parking as well as bathrooms available on site.

Name: Lago Lucchetti Área de Acampar
Description: Lake Lucchetti counts with an area for shore and bote fishing. The facilities also include bathrooms with showers, gazebos, a ramp for boats, sidewalks, a ramp for disabled people, as well as parking. Price per night for adults is $4.00 and $2.00 for children under 10 years old.

Name: Parque Nacional Balneario Punta Guilarte Área de Acampar
Description: Balneario Punta Guilarte National Park is located in the coastal area of Arroyo and it has tow houses and camping, as well as cabins and villas for rent. The facilities include bathrooms, showers and green areas. Price for camping is $10.00, and prices for parking vary from $2.00 for motorbikes, $3.00 for cars, $4.00 for mini-vans and $5.00 for buses.

Name: Playa Santa Área de Acampar
Description: Note: camp at your own risk. This beach offers banana boat rides, jet ski rentals, pedal boats, kayak rentals, beach chairs, and other fun things. In addition to that, across the street there is a restauarant & bar, El Ancla Flotate, for food and beverages.

Name: Playa Villa Pesquera Área de Acampar
Description: The Villa Pesquera Beach facilities count with showers, bathrooms and a picnic area.

Name: Treehouse of Life
Description: This treehouse is in a tree that was planted and grown for living! Surrounded by a private 5-acre botanical preserve with fruits and flowers, frogs and birds.

Name: Pitahaya Glamping Eco-Retreat
Description: Pitahaya Glamping Retreat Glamping provides an excellent opportunity to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and seek out and relax in truly magical places. Pitahaya Glamping Retreat, the first Puerto Rican glamping site truly fits that description.

Name: Casa Isabel Bed and Breakfast
Description: A beautiful and historical residence featuring "criollo" architecture. Decorated and outfitted with fine details. Located in the heart of the Condado tourist area, near the beach and a short walk from the Loíza St. gastronomic area.

Name: Casa Los Cummins
Description: Cozy bohemian-beach style Guest House in the center of the stylish neighborhood of Condado, less than 1/2 mile away from the beach! Rooms can be booked individually, or the Entire Casa is available for groups and events.

Name: Casa Sol Bed and Breakfast
Description: Caressed by the warm winds of the Atlantic and surrounded by history and culture, Casa Sol is the first Bed & Breakfast located within legendary Old San Juan. Its guests enjoy the experience of lodging in a colonial building built in the eighteenth century, which has been restored and decorated to reach a modern ambiance by its owners Eddie Ramírez and Margarita Pastor. Casa Sol is a piece of architecture that evokes the past, but offers commodity to the modern traveler that searches for personal attention in a cozy and family friendly ambiance.

Name: Casa Verde Hotel
Description: After just one visit to Casa Verde Hotel, you will fall in love with the casual vibe of this relaxing and affordable family friendly surfers’ getaway in Rincón, Puerto Rico. Tucked away in the secluded western coast of Puerto Rico, their intimate 19-room hotel welcomes you with charming, comfortable accommodations laid back dining and live entertainment at the Kahuna Burger Bar. Casa Verde Hotel offers a warm, personalized alternative to larger, chain-style hotels.

Name: Dos Aguas Bed and Breakfast
Description: Dos Aguas is the quintessential modern yet intimate eco-friendly bed & breakfast nestled in a forest of bamboo trees on the fork where the Rio Grande and Espiritu Santo river meet near the National Rainforest El Yunque. Our two-story abode and friendly staff will invite you to disconnect from your daily routine and breathe in the magical nature of the area and of our culture.

Name: Dreams Hotel Puerto Rico
Description: Awesome! Home away from home… Friendly, comfortable, reliable, in the real Puerto Rico. Their rooms were recently renovated. This is a delightful new alternative to traditional high priced and crowded hotels. Conveniently located three blocks from the University of Puerto Rico, in San Juan, only 5 minutes from the international airport Luis Muñoz Marín, nearby Plaza Las Américas Shopping Center and nearby “Paseo de Diego” in Rio Piedras. Dreams is a choice selection for vacation, business people and medical tourism. They are a small, green, budget hotel, with amazing prices.

Name: Hotel Hacienda Gripiñas
Description: Hotel Hacienda Gripiñas Jayuya is a paradise hidden among the dense mountains of Jayuya. You will be able to completely disconnect and have a relaxing stay in full connection with nature. In addition, the Hotel has the La Campina Restaurant where you can enjoy a varied menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. To reserve your stay you can contact the following numbers:939-275-6493/939-274-8936/787-304-1968 Service hours: Monday to Sunday from 8am-8pm

Name: Luquillo Sunrise Beach Inn
Description: Our small guest house located outside the busy tourism area on the beach in Eastern Puerto Rico is a nature lover's dream with a million-dollar view.

Name: A La Bella Noni
Description: A La Bella Noni Bed & Breakfast is nestled in a very peaceful & tranquil Caribbean neighborhood in the beautiful city of Aguadilla. It is conveniently located, less than10 min from Rafael Hernandez Airport, 35 min from Mayaguez Airport and only 2 hours to San Juan.

Name: CasaBlanca Hotel
Description: To walk into centric Hotel CasaBlanca is to be transported to a parallel reality in which colors explode and eclecticism reigns. Although the hotel-boutique has an air of sophistication and silver-screen glamour (“Here’s looking at you, kid” Bogart seems to eternally toast from the TV in the lobby), it feels young and actualized. The golden brocade curtains evoke a sense of luxury and decadence, and the vases with heliconias and monsteras remind the guests that they are in tropical paradise.

Name: My Hotel in Puerto Rico
Description: My Hotel in Puerto Rico is conveniently located in the midle of Old San Juan, just 4 minutes from Teatro Tapia. It has a garden and a terrace. Rooms include air conditioner, desk, Cable TV, and a private bathroom with shower and free amenities. Laundry services is available for our guests. The hotel is located very close to all Old San Juan attractions like 1.6km from the San Felipe del Morro Fort, 400 meters from San Juan Bautista Cathedral and 14km from the International Luis Muñoz Marín Airport.

Name: The Lazy Guesthouse
Description: Come be a beach bum on the island of Vieques! The Lazy Hostel is located right on the ocean boardwalk in Esperanza within walking distance of five beaches, eleven bars and restaurants, shops, tours companies and all kinds of island activities. Kayak to Cayo Afuero, build an oceanside bonfire, hike the trails on Cayo de Tierra, snorkel the sunken sailboat or relax on the beach with a beer. Our staff love the island and can help you make the most of your trip.

Name: Rainforest Inn Bed and Breakfast
Description: An elegant, luxurious, and secluded bed and breakfast nestled deep in the El Yunque Rainforest. This boutique eco-lodge features secure privacy and homey intimate villas. Gourmet vegetarian breakfasts included as well as free WIFI and free parking. Exclusive access to the "Lost Machete Hike". Explore private jungle pools and waterfalls. Rainforest Inn is an exclusive romantic escape for couples.

Name: Canyon Boutique Hotel
Description: Canyon Boutique Hotel was first established as El Cañón Guest House in June 2014. We are a modern, 18-room Boutique Hotel located in the beautiful town of Barranquitas. Barranquitas is known for its gastronomy, views and peaceful ambiance, which is perfect for visitors that want to enjoy both the local flora and fauna and a lovely walk through town. At Canyon Boutique Hotel, we provide guests with restaurant guides and landmark suggestions that will guarantee a memorable trip to our town.

Name: Club Seabourne
Description: Nestled in the hillsides of Culebra Island, just a few miles from the easternmost tip of Puerto Rico, is Club Seabourne, an intimate mini-resort for those who value life’s simple pleasures. Enjoy world-class amenities and services, casual dining, a host of activities, and access to the world’s most famous beaches. Information sourced from Club Seabourne (Fajardo)

Name: Dream Inn PR
Description: Known for its eco-friendly practices, Dream Inn is a lovely boutique hotel with a brutalist and minimalist architecture. The venue has a relaxing atmosphere and a unique design that is definitely Instagram worthy . Dream Inn is the prefect place for those looking for a quiet place to relax at close proximity with all the great attractions San Juan has to offer.

Name: Acacia Boutique Hotel - Condado
Description: Take a swim in the cozy outdoor pool and enjoy a breathtaking view of the beach. Acacia offers elegant Spanish style villas in the heart of one of the most popular areas in San Juan.

Name: Canario Boutique Hotel
Description: Affordable beachside bed & breakfast adjacent to San Juan Marriott in the heart of the Condado. Friendly, informal atmosphere makes it a favorite with business and holiday travelers. The 25 charming rooms have a private bath, telephone, a/c, cable TV. Complimentary continental breakfast served in a tropical courtyard patio. Very close to beaches and hotel Condado, with a very nice garden in the front entrance, a 24-hour front desk. It's close to the Art Center Luis A. Ferrer and the Luis Muñoz Marin Airport.

Name: Ababor Suites
Description: "Welcome to Ababor Suites! a private and peaceful beachfront property! Tranquility awaits at this quaint beachfront paradise. Feel the sand between your toes as you enjoy your breakfast, relax in the gazebo or simply soak in the beautiful views of the Caribbean. This amazing house is located directly on beautiful Bastimento Beach; minutes from town and all conveniences, yet a world apart from the hustle and bustle of the “real world.” The essence of the Caribbean is captured in the small details from the vibrant paint to the eclectic décor.

Name: Aguadilla Guest House
Description: Our accommodations offer breathtaking ocean views in a relaxing atmosphere at an affordable price. Come and enjoy the sunsets in our terraces and open areas.

Name: Barefoot Travelers Rooms & Adventures Guesthouse
Description: This unique adventure guesthouse is walking distance to the beach, easy access to the East and North parts of interest, including the rain forest, Old San Juan, Guavate, Luquillo Beach, ferries to Culebra and Vieques and many more secret spots around our area to share. We offer a chilled out, clean, comfortable and affordable guesthouse for all travelers, friends, families, solo travelers and couples. 'Barefoot' is an easy going relaxing spot to spend part or all of your Puerto Rico exploration. We also offer kayaking Eco-tours and rentals.

Name: Casa De Claire Guesthouse
Description: Vieques Island is one of the most unique islands in the Caribbean. From the picturesque beaches, the wild Paso Fino horses, to the world's most flourishing Bioluminescent Bay, Vieques is sure to enchant, excite and inspire - and there's no better place to stay than Casa De Claire.

Name: Casa de Kathy
Description: Casa de Kathy has been rated EXCELLENT on Trip Advisor since 2003. We are in Esperanza, only a seven-minute walk to the “Malecon”, our premier oceanfront tourist area. Beaches, snorkeling, restaurants, BioBay tours, groceries, & bakery are close by. Choose between two super clean and comfortable apartments in an owner-occupied property. Panoramic ocean view from the shared balcony

Name: Casa de Playa - Aguadilla
Description: We have 4 apartments in a building next to "Rompeolas Beach" in downtown Aguadilla. Our rooms are equipped with a/c and most of them have double beds and provide bed linings. All the apartments have a private kitchen-dining area, equipped with a coffee maker, microwave, stove, and fridge. We also provide the dishes, kitchenware, mugs, glasses, etc. Every apartment has its own private bathroom with an electric shower. We provide the towel for our guests. We do not provide beach towels. Gated entrance for security

Name: Cofresí Beach Hotel
Description: Cofresí Beach Hotel is located on the Caribbean southwest coast of Puerto Rico, in Boquerón Town "El Poblado", surrounded by beautifull beaches, exquisite restaurants, outdoor activities and fun nightlife. Best of all, you get to all places just steps away. Our comfortable apartments will make you feel at home. Equipped apartments with central air conditioning, full kitchen and cable tv. Free Wi-Fi access, private parking, elevator and rooftop pool. Capacities from 2 to 8 people including children. Come and escape to Boquerón and discover our treasure!

Name: Coquí del Mar Guest House
Description: At Coqui del Mar Guest House you will enjoy the city like a local. They offer everything from small comfy rooms to chic villas where you can relax and feel at home.

Name: Decanter Hotel
Description: Nestled in the heart of Old San Juan stands a lovingly restored 19th century colonial-style building, the elegant and charming Decanter Hotel. A four-story landmark built around 1880, offers 20 hotel guest rooms and suites, with exquisite décor and decadent fine dining. Experience the best of this magical city from our hotel, located just steps from the Cathedral of San Juan Bautista and many other cultural attractions, savory restaurants and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Posada Hotel Colonial
Description: Located in the largest city of the western region of Porta del Sol, this posada offers a unique experience in a former nun convent. You can stay in a room inside the former chapel or in a former nun's private room, and feel the mystic experience of the local religious culture. Mayagüez offers a beautiful main square with the largest cathedral of the region, a variety of gastronomy offerings, theatre, and nightlife experiences.

Name: Hotel Costa de Oro Inn
Description: Hotel Costa de Oro lnn. Tempting offer to enjoy with the family in the west area near the best beaches and tourist attractions. We have a double room with capacity for 4 people, 2 adults and 2 children. We are located at Carr.102 km 14.7 Joyudas Cabo Rojo. Quiet and relaxing environment close to the best restaurants in the area.

Name: Hotel Villa del Sol
Description: Welcome to Hotel Villa del Sol, a small hotel providing a warm ambiance with friendly staff allowing a comfortable stay for all our guests. Among the many amenities provided by its location, guests will enjoy the safety and beauty of the Isla Verde Beach only a block away, home to sun lovers around the island and around the world. In addition, we are just 5 minutes away from the San Juan International Airport and at only walking distance of well-named restaurants and casinos. Not to exclude the easy access to the rain forest, shopping malls and various sources of entertainment.

Name: IHG Army Hotels El Caney Lodge
Description: Welcome to Holiday Inn Express, El Caney Complex on Ft. Buchanan, nestled in the heart of San Juan, Puerto Rico. Holiday Inn Express welcomes active and retired Armed Forces, authorized personnel and their families to Fort Buchanan. Whether you are a DoD Civilian or here for business or pleasure, we are the perfect choice. Our on-Post accommodations are convenient as the facility is located across the street from the Community Club & Conference Center and within walking distance from the Commissary, Post Exchange and PXtra. Ft.

Name: Finca Victoria
Description: Finca Victoria's transformation into a wellness hotel and retreat center signifies a remarkable shift in Vieques' tourism scene. It offers visitors a chance to bask in the island's natural beauty while indulging in vital self-care and personal growth. With its spa, yoga sessions, themed retreats, and the option to host your own retreat, the hotel is on the cusp of becoming Vieques' wellness hub. What's more, for guests opting for extended stays, all rooms are now equipped with full kitchens.

Name: La Jamaca Hotel & Restaurant
Description: La Jamaca is a 16 bedroom eco friendly property on the beautiful west side of the island in a fisherman town well known for its bioluminescent bay. You will truly feel and island vibe upon arrival and a local feeling. We host a bar The Pineapplebar which serves amazing piña coladas on a pineapple, flavored natural fruit mojitos and more! Our restaurant serves tasty Caribbean Food such as fresh lobsters, conch meat, fresh red snapper plus other light meals. Our newest amenity Las Tinas are a must!

Name: La Playita Hotel
Description: Just 4.8 km from the airport, La Playita puts you just a five-minute drive from Balneario de Carolina and Carolina Beach. If you want to keep fit during your trip, nearby you can choose from kayaking, parasailing, and scuba diving, and the accommodation features free details such as Wi-Fi, unassisted parking, and a continental breakfast, served daily from 7:00 to 11:00 a.m. A terrace and garden are other highlights, and rooms feature flat-screen TVs and refrigerators. The staff's friendliness and proximity to the airport are two aspects highlighted by other travelers.

Name: Las Cavernas Guesthouse
Description: Featuring Restaurant and free WiFi, Cavernas Guest House is located in Quebrada. Guests can enjoy garden views. The rooms are equipped with a closet and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at the guesthouse have a patio. All rooms will provide guests with a microwave. The nearest airport is Rafael Hernández Airport, 51.5 km from Cavernas Guest House. This property also has one of the top-rated locations in Quebrada! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This property is also rated for the best value in Quebrada!

Name: Luichy's Guest House
Description: Facing the beachfront in El Combate, Luichy’s Guest House has a terrace. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The property has an ATM and free WiFi. All rooms at the guesthouse are equipped with a seating area. Some rooms also feature a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster. Guest rooms at Luichy’s Guest House have air conditioning and a closet. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant, which serves American cuisine. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around El Combate, like cycling.

Name: Malecon House
Description: Malecón House is a 13-room Boutique Hotel situated on the Malecón, a fun, picturesque Caribbean boardwalk in the charming seaside village of Esperanza, Vieques, Puerto Rico. A short stroll brings you to beach bars, restaurants, boutiques and exciting island-style activities and tours.

Name: Manati World Point Inn
Description: Located in the cultural coastal city of Manati, Puerto Rico, Manati World Point Inn is a luxurious and chic 8 suite plus two mobile unit resort just 6 minutes from Playa de Mar Chiquita.
Street Address: Carr. 685 Km. 2.7 Interior Barrio Tierras Nuevas

Name: Posada La Hamaca
Description: Conveniently located place to stay in Culebra, Puerto Rico. Near to Flamenco Beach, restaurants, grocery stores and the bakery. Information sourced from Posada La Hamaca (Facebook)

Name: Siete Mares Bay Inn
Description: One of three individually and tastefully created units, each housing 2 persons. Every unit has its private entrance. Equipped with new quality queen size bed, new and quiet a/c, bathroom with hot water, cable TV. The rooms are simple and basic but have all you need to make this your comfortable base to explore Puerto Rico.

Name: Tres Sirenas Beach Inn
Description: Tres Sirenas is a beautiful oceanfront boutique Bed & Breakfast located directly on the beach in Rincon, Puerto Rico. This intimate, award-winning B&B offers the best of vacationing in Puerto Rico. This luxurious two-story villa offers five exclusive accommodations with panoramic ocean views. The terra-cotta-tiled rooms are tastefully decorated and all have private white-washed balconies. Experience the dream of living “La Vida Sirena.”

Name: Villa Flamenco Beach
Description: Villa Flamenco Beach is a small, comfortable, casual and friendly light housekeeping beachfront villa, offering a total of six fully furnished and air-conditioned apartments with Wi-Fi, all with direct access to the radiant turquoise waters and white sand. Information sourced from Villa Flamenco Beach (Facebook)

Name: Villa Vista Linda
Description: Nestled in the lush green hills of tropical Vieques, overlooking the south Caribbean, rests Vista Linda, one of the island’s most elegant properties. Surrounded by expansive tropical gardens, Vista Linda embodies the serene seclusion of a private, gated hacienda with convenient and easy access to the island’s many beaches and the villages of Esperanza and Isabel Segunda.

Name: Casa Coral Luquillo
Description: Accessible, Casual Hostel in Northeast Puerto Rico. A comfortable stay awaits you in Luquillo, where you can easily access both lush quiet nature and the action in town. The view from the open-air common area is of the Sabana River estuary in the “Northeast Ecological Corridor” Nature Reserve. Restaurants, bars, shops, and secluded beaches are all accessible by foot. Dorm rooms and private rooms are available for rent, as well as the whole house for groups.

Name: Conturce Hostel
Description: Located in the heart of Santurce, Conturce Hostel is an urban and sociable place to stay. The cozy style and quality of the accommodations, make it a perfect hostel for young people and backpackers alike.

Name: Coral by the Sea Hotel
Description: Welcome to Coral by the Sea Hotel in San Juan, Puerto Rico. A family owned and family operated company. With many years in the hospitality industry, they have learned that excellence in service is the key to succeed in this industry. High-quality service combined with our strategic location in the tourist section of Isla Verde makes us the ideal place to stay in Puerto Rico either for business travel or a vacation trip.

Name: Hotel San Jorge
Description: Welcome to San Juan's best choice for everyday discounted rates for a full service hotel with 24 hour front desk. All standard rooms have FULL size beds, free WiFi , cable TV, key-card entry, air conditioning, mini-fridge, phone, safe deposit box, and private bathroom (shower/no tub). Microwave & Vending Machines available in lobby. Coin-operated washer/dryer on 2nd floor terrace.

Name: Borinquen Beach Inn Hotel
Description: Our goal is to provide you with a pleasant stay at a very affordable price while also being located in the center of Isla Verde's nightlife, the best of Puerto Rico. Beautiful beaches, restaurants, and casinos are within walking distance and are well known for hosting many aquatic sports and, of course, the inviting Caribbean sun. So come join us, we are only a toll free phone call away, or you may easily book online using the form below!

Name: Hotel Kokomo
Description: Come visit beautiful Culebra Island, stay at the upgraded Hotel Kokomo!. Close to the ferry, restaurants, cafe's, gift shops, and night life. We have a cafe and bar onsite for your convenience. UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT - short taxi ride to world-famous Flamenco Beach! We are located directly across from the passenger ferry terminal and one mile from the only airport.

Name: Parador Guánica 1929
Description: History has never been so relaxing at the historic Parador Guánica 1929, a family-friendly inn offering comfortable accommodations and affordable “All-Inclusive” packages in the heart of Guánica Bay in southwestern Puerto Rico. Our 90-year-old Parador was witness to the turn of the century sugar cane industry on the island and you will discover first hand the true beauty of its relaxing vistas and charm.

Name: Parador Costa del Mar
Description: Visit Parador Costa del Mar located in the southeast of the island. Our family-friendly hotel is nestled between the lush mountains of Puerto Rico and the sparkling view of the Caribbean Sea. Enjoy the convenience of an unparalleled location near natural and historical wonders and relish our wide array of on-site amenities before retiring to one of our 16 comfortable guest rooms for a restful night of sleep, twelve of them with ocean view.

Name: Aquarius Vacation Club at Dorado
Description: Gracing a beautiful beach on Puerto Rico's popular northern coast, Dorado del Mar Beach Resort captures the essence of its sun-splashed resort location. Located just 25 miles from San Juan in the exclusive resort town of Dorado, this classic resort pairs spacious villas with full kitchens and poolside dining with breathtaking Atlantic Ocean views.

Name: The Tryst Beachfront Hotel
Description: Located in one of the most popular beachfront in San Juan, The Tryst Beachfront Hotel is Condado's only beachfront boutique hotel and a superior option for your tropical vacation. The venue is intimate and the staff is committed to making you feel like you in a home away from home.

Name: Casa del Caribe Inn
Description: It's a pretty low budget Inn, best for those who look for small places but and affordable, just minutes away from the Condado Beach, restaurants, and even pubs.

Name: Combate Beach Resort
Description: Your idyllic retreat into Puerto Rico's secluded southwestern region begins at our boutique hotel. Step into our 47-room, boutique hotel and enjoy all the amenities needed for a rewarding vacation! Our quality service and facilities make it the most awarded hotel in the island. Nestled into the picturesque coastline of Puerto Rico’s tranquil and unspoiled Cabo Rojo region, there’s plenty to see and do at our island paradise:

Name: Abitta Boutique Hotel
Description: At the heart of Condado, nestled between the lagoon and the beach, lies your homely Ábitta. Ábitta Boutique Hotel is home to comfortable accommodations with a delicious restaurant, a co-working space, and a tranquil place for all travelers. We are conveniently located near some of the most magical places that San Juan has to offer.

Name: Coral Princess Hotel - San Juan
Description: Coral Princess Inn is an elegant 25 room boutique hotel offering the business traveler and families an excellently priced alternative in a cozy and comfortable atmosphere. Managed by its owners, you will receive personalized quality service that will surely make you feel at home. Only a 2-minute walk from shops, restaurants, coffee shops and casinos in the Condado area. Located 15 minutes from Old San Juan and 10 minutes from the International Airport and Isla Verde.

Name: Hotel El Guajataca
Description: Hotel El Guajataca is located at the most beautiful beach views in Puerto Rico located at the hill top of the town of Quebradillas. All our 38 rooms enjoy breathtaking ocean views with the personal service of a family-owned small inn. We specialize in providing unforgettable wedding ceremonies and receptions.

Name: Hotel Milano
Description: From this classically restored building in the heart of Old San Juan, you can walk to the most important historical sites. Enjoy the local flavor at Panorama Bar and Grill while you view the magnificent harbor full of cruise ships. There are 30 fully air-conditioned rooms, with season rates from $80.00 to $135.00. Off-season rates from $75.00 to $115.00 (tax not included).

Name: Mayagüez Resort & Casino
Description: Welcome to the Mayagüez Resort & Casino. Either on business or enjoying your vacations, we hope your stay at the Mayaguez Resort & Casino is a pleasant one. Escape with your family discovering a water and sun paradise with ancient ruins, castle, and tropical forest. Discover an island of pure aquatic fun. We invite you to the River Pool Village at The Best in the West and create unforgettable experiences and memories.

Name: Parguera Plaza Hotel
Description: Parguera Plaza Hotel serves as a gateway to the lively energy, iconic beach style and glamorous atmosphere of the highly frequented and renowned tourist area, La Parguera. Our rooms are equipped with a range of amenities designed to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. Start your day with a delicious cup of Puerto Rican coffee, browse local designer boutiques, and soak up the sun on our crystal-clear keys, just minutes from the main docks. Later, immerse yourself in the neighborhood's vibrant nightlife after witnessing our unforgettable sunset.

Name: Plantation Resort Residences at Dorado Beach
Description: Overlooking lush, green mountains and the emerald fairways of three championship Robert Trent Jones, Sr. golf courses, Plantation Resort's three-bedroom, four-bath Mediterranean-style condominiums, and penthouses include state-of-the-art designer kitchens and master suites with deep soaking tubs along with grocery stocking services and private chef services. Floor plans range from 1,880 to 3,700 square feet with each residence accompanied by 24-hour Destination Concierge service, a four-seat golf cart, and a dedicated team to make your stay memorable.

Name: Punta Borinquen Resort
Description: New, modern and fully renovated Punta Borinquen Resort, is located in the historical and former Ramey Air Force Base. Inspired by the beautiful Atlantic Ocean view, Punta Borinquen Resort offers 92 single and double bedroom suites, pool facilities, and an on-site restaurant. The hotel’s modern and minimalist concept appeals to the simple laid-back traveler on a business trip or families that want to explore the rest of the island. Punta Borinquen Resort is the ideal option for travelers due to its proximity to the Rafael Hernández Airport, which is only a 5-minute drive from the hotel.

Name: Esperanza Inn
Description: Welcome to the Esperanza Inn... Your Island Vacation Home. As a family run Inn, we are proud to host a mix of large beautifully appointed guest rooms. We also have three 1 & 2 bedroom apartments with full kitchens. We are a gated property and welcome single travelers, couples, families with children 13+ as well as groups of 4 to 30.

Name: Mayaguez Plaza Hotel
Description: Howard Johnson, a hotel situated at the heart of Mayagüez city, is a historical landmark that served as a monastery in 1904. Currently, the hotel has over 48 classic styled guest rooms which offer affordable accommodations with easy walking distance access to historic attractions in downtown Mayagüez. Howard Johnson is a classic boutique hotel for business travelers, corporate and local visitors. The hotel facilities also feature themed Spanish tapas and wine lounge for our visitors.

Name: Parador Boquemar
Description: Enjoy a pleasant stay at the Parador Boquemar, located in the "poblado” of Boqueron in Cabo Rojo, Puerto Rico. Only steps away from Boquerón Beach, one of the most popular beaches on the island and it is considered by many to be one of the best beaches in the world according to the BLUEFLAG World Class Beach Directory. Its calm waters are ideal for family fun and many water sports. The weather is perfect throughout the year and the sun is always shining so you can get an excellent tan and see spectacular sunsets.

Name: Hacienda Moraica
Description: The Hacienda has 111 cultivated cords of coffee, bananas and citrus groves. It has a restaurant, swimming pool, courts and playing areas.

Name: 413 Apartments
Description: Fully furnished vacation rental located right on Rincon's famous Route 413, at only minutes from World Class surfing beaches and close to everything in Rincon, Puerto Rico!

Name: Kasa Maui
Description: Kasa Maui is located on Sandy Beach Road in Rincón, Puerto Rico. Steps from Sandy Beach, our one-bedroom apartments are perfect for your vacation. Tamboo Bar, Big Kahuna Bar, and Casa Islena. are all within walking distance of Kasa Maui.

Name: Pelican Reef Apartments
Description: Our vacation rental apartment is a unit of Pelican Reef Apartments. The swinging palm trees bordering the ocean add on the existing beauty of the ocean-dominated landscape. This home is perfect for both short terms as well as long term vacations. Our child-friendly 1 bedroom apartment rental Isabela comes with suitable sleeping arrangements for up to four vacationers. The color scheme of the bedroom is very pleasing. It is also laden with essential amenities for your convenience. The bathroom is aptly fitted with all the basic amenities.

Name: Posada Colonial Vacation Apartments
Description: Enjoy a great stay at Posada Colonial Vacation apartments, where you will find comfortable accommodations, a few steps from a variety of restaurants and beaches to choose from in San Juan.

Name: Tamarindo Estates
Description: Tamarindo Estates provides 12 kitchen-equipped, comfortable, simple, guest rental apartments, perfect for a romantic getaway. The apartments have their private entrance, sit higher up on a hill, allowing breathtaking ocean views from their own roofed deck. Down by the beach area of the estates, registered guests may use the beach house to take shade, read a book, relax, and from there walk-in to remarkable snorkeling spots on the Marine Reserve. The property is very quiet and secluded, yet only a 7-minute drive from town.

Name: Turtle Bay Inn
Description: Turtle Bay Inn is a unique and charming place located in a quiet area, away from the noisy downtown El Poblado (La Parguera-public square area). Most guests’ reviews highlight the quality of sleep, relaxing atmosphere, and superior cleanliness of rooms, premises and gardens. It is located at just steps from downtown El Poblado and Playita Rosada (natural swimming pool) in the town of Lajas, Puerto Rico. La Parguera is a very beautiful fishermen village that is part of the Natural Reserve between Guánica and Cabo Rojo.

Name: Wave Coast - Suite 8
Description: Soak up the sun and sea at Suite 8, on one of the most beautiful beaches in the region, Corcega Beach, the nicest swimming beach in Rincon, just steps from our front door. Our beach is perfect for snorkeling, paddle-boarding, or just relaxing or playing in the sand. Our style is modern and minimalist while being fully equipped with top-of-the-line EVERYTHING. Including the roof-top terrace, Suite 8 is a spacious 3-story property (2100 sq.ft.), air-conditioned throughout.

Name: Andrades By The Sea
Description: Andrades by the sea offers apartments studio-style that are completely equipped with anything you might need during your stay. Excellent for families who are looking for a weekend getaway to the beautiful island of Culebra.For dates and prices, don't hesitate to give them a call!

Name: Nómada Urban Beach Hostel
Description: Welcome to Nomada Hostels, Puerto Rico’s first hostel group. Our properties are full of charm, personality, and culture with a unique cozy style. We provide a variety of ways for you to enjoy your stay: island tours, hiking in El Yunque National Forest, beer and wine tastings, boat trips, tours of Old San Juan and more. Come and experience Nómada for yourself!

Name: Sue's Place
Description: Perched on a hilltop immersed in the foothills of El Yunque the Caribbean National Rainforest, Sue’s place is a private and secluded oasis that welcomes couples, friends, families and adventurous travelers alike. Enjoy both the warm beaches and cool rivers while staying at Sue’s Place, both are less than 15 min. away.

Name: Hacienda Luis
Description: Hacienda Luis is located in the Municipality of Lares in the Central Mountain area of Puerto Rico. Being "Direct contact with the nature" the slogan, Hacienda Luis is classified as one of the darkest places around the world. Perfect spot to see the stars and the beauty of the night.

Name: Casa Luna Guest House
Description: Colonial design with true Old San Juan spirit. Rooms have A/C, TV, kitchenette with fridge, microwave, coffee maker, dinning table, closet, private bathroom, wifi. (Option of balcony or private entrance). We are located in the heart of Old San Juan. Walking distance to restaurants, shops, cafes and all main attractions. We want to offer you a pleasant experience during your stay.

Name: El Navegante Guest House
Description: El Navegante de Culebra is a unique and charming lodge located in a quiet area of town. Our lodge consists of nine rooms and most of them provide a spectacular view of the Ensenada Honda Bay, sailboats, and an unforgettable sunrise. If you are looking for a modern, nice and clean place to stay in Culebra – you have found your spot.

Name: El Pretexto
Description: El Pretexto is Puerto Rico's first Culinary Farm Lodge. It is our beautiful home that we chose to share with our guests. A Bed & Breakfast nestled in the countryside community of Cercadillo in Cayey. Our life undertaking combines 3 wooden villas surrounded by native and fruit trees, with a small agroecological raised beds farm and gastronomic experiences. The deck has amazing views from the mountain all the way to the south coast of Puerto Rico.

Name: Numero Uno Beach House
Description: At Numero Uno Beach House, long stretches of soft sand and crystal clear waters are only steps away. Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise at our newly renovated and laid-back but contemporary accommodations. Located directly on Ocean Park Beach and just minutes from Old San Juan Historic Centre and Luis Munoz International Airport, guests enjoy clean, comfortable rooms with a flat-screen HD TV, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, mini fridge, and in-room safe.

Name: Sueños del Mar
Description: Sueños del Mar Vacation Rental apartments offer ocean views from the balcony and is in a prime location with on-site free parking. The two-bedroom apartments have a living room and fully equipped kitchen. There are two styles to choose from Queen Deluxe with two queen size beds or Standard with one queen and two twin size beds. Sueños del Mar offers the best location. It is in walking distance to the bioluminescence bay excursions, local restaurants and less than a minute drive to Seven Seas Beach and Cabezas de San Juan. You are a short drive to the ferries going to Vieques and Culebra.

Name: Tarpon's Nest Lodge
Description: The Tarpon's Nest Lodge is the coziest hotel in all of Piñones, and has proven to be one of the most accessible as well. This small hotel boutique is located near Puerto Andín, the Cangrejos Yacht Club and the Corporación Piñones se Integra, where you can rent kayaks to navigate the lagoon and bicycles to explore Piñones' amazing linear park. The Tarpon's Nest Lodge distinguishes itself from the rest by providing excellent service and by accommodating to their guests' every need.

Name: The Gallery Inn
Description: The Gallery Inn is a stunning twenty-three room boutique hotel that sits high aloft the Old San Juan City’s North Wall, commanding sensuous Atlantic Ocean breezes and gorgeous 360º views over the San Juan Bay and mountainous central regions of Puerto Rico. Due to our small number of rooms, but large areas of open space, which include 15 patios and open terraces spread throughout 22,000 square feet, the Gallery Inn is especially suited to follow social distancing rules and provide a safe haven for guests.

Name: Villa Chavaniac
Description: Villa Chavaniac is an extraordinary oceanfront oasis and unique property on Isla de Vieques with 7 bedrooms, 6 1/2 baths and can accommodate up to 14 guests. It is the perfect paradise island vacation spot. Boasting one of the closest oceanfront vacation rentals in Vieques and offering 180 degree view of the merging of the Atlantic Ocean with the Caribbean Sea, you will be able to enjoy all the island has to offer.

Name: Dos Ángeles del Mar Bed and Breakfast
Description: Located on the tropical west coast of Puerto Rico, Rincón is known for its beautiful beaches, small-town tranquility, and breath-taking sunsets. Dos Angeles del Mar Bed and Breakfast is dedicated to providing high-quality service and an enjoyable stay. We have consistently won high-quality awards from neutral third party associations such as the Puerto Rico tourism association, awards of excellence from trip advisor™, and continue to receive the praise of our guests. If you are looking for a nice, clean, place to stay in Puerto Rico – you have found your destination!

Name: Hilltop House
Description: The Hilltop House is located atop its own little mountain where the elevation provides privacy, stunning views of Ensenada Honda and Vieques.Information sourced from Hilltop House Culebra (Facebook)

Name: Culebra Beach Rental
Description: A complex located directly at Flamenco Beach, ideal for relaxing and enjoying the tranquil beauty of the Island of Culebra at the best location of the Island.Information sourced from Culebra Beach Rental

Name: Pura Vida, Punto del Viento Estates
Description: Pura Vida in Culebra is a 5 bedroom luxury villa on 5 acres with views of Las Pelás Bay, Culebrita and the island of St. Thomas. Property is located on the quieter and more private side of Culebra with gorgeous views of the greatest variety of ocean blue colors you have ever seen. One mile away from one of Culebra's most beautiful beaches: Zoní Beach and just a 15-minute drive to the famous Flamenco Beach. All rooms have inverter air conditioning and/or fans. Two master bedrooms with king-size beds, private bathroom, and balconies.

Name: Alelí Cottages
Description: With spectacular views to the Luis Pena Canal, Alelí Cottages is a private and romantic destination where you can enjoy a nice and relaxing weekend in paradise. Visitors can enjoy peaceful activities such as bird-watching, seeing passing yachts, as well as listening to the ocean sounds. Come and discover this little local heaven!

Name: Casa Guava
Description: Enjoy the view of La Pela Bay and changing of colors of the water on this beautiful, tropical vacation house! With high roofs, open spaces, an outdoor terrace, a plunge pool and much more, it is the perfect place to enjoy a nice, relaxing weekend with friends and family.

Name: Casa Kristina
Description: This 5 bedroom, 3 bathroom house is located right between two great beaches, Sandy Beach, and Pools beach. You are located on a quiet side street, but still within walking distance to many bars/restaurants and gift shops. The house is set up as 2 units with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms upstairs and 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom downstairs (connected by stairs on the exterior only).

Name: Casa SuMarco
Description: Casa SuMarco is a single-family house on a beautifully landscaped enclosed property with locked gate access. It has 2 bedrooms, full kitchen, bathroom, plus 2nd outdoor shower, private parking. The huge wrap-around deck has magnificent sunrise-to-sunset views of the bay, Ensenada Honda, with both sunny and shaded areas for dining and lounging. Situated near the bay it gets a steady eastern breeze. It has plentiful solar hot water. Both bedrooms are air-conditioned, all other rooms have ceiling fans.

Name: Hola Paradise
Description: Welcome to the incomparable Hola Paradise! With a privileged beachfront location and a fully remodeled and newly furnished interior, we invite you to come enjoy the Puerto Rico vacay of your dreams! The property consists of two rental units: a 3-bedroom (with pool) unit and a 1-bedroom unit. Amenities include air-conditioned bedrooms, free gated parking, free WiFi, free laundry, and loads of beach gear. World-class surf, epic snorkeling, and over 100 restaurants are nearby. It’s a 10-minute drive to the Rincón plaza. *Five Night Minimum* Click "Visit Website" for more details.

Name: Maria's - Luxury Villa
Description: Maria's is an 8-bedroom oceanfront villa located on Maria's Beach, Rincon. Maria's is ideal for large gatherings such as family reunions, weddings, yoga retreats, surfing vacations, corporate retreats and more. The spacious side lawn is perfect for a party tent. Enjoy the swimming pool or go to the beach through our private access. This beautiful villa features: 8 bedrooms (kings, queens and full-size beds), 6 full bathrooms, 2 fully equipped kitchens, and 2 large dining tables. The living rooms and master bedrooms feature Dish TV.

Name: Por Fin Dogman's Beach
Description: Neither words nor pictures can begin to describe the ocean breezes, tropical landscape, or colorful sunsets you’ll find here at Casa Por Fin dogman's beach. Whether traveling alone or with a large group, you’ve found a rental that is sure to please. With 5 bedrooms and 3 1/2 bathrooms (6 bedrooms, 4 baths available in summer months), this villa can accommodate 12-14 guests comfortably (16 in summer months). There is a fully equipped kitchen. The dining room and living room have a full wall of french doors that opens out to a nicely furnished covered Lanai.

Name: Azalea Beach Rentals
Description: PERFECT RIO GRANDE LUQUILLO BEACH VACATION. NO CLEANING FEE.

Name: Casa Cubuy Ecolodge
Description: We are on the south side of El Yunque National Forest. There are trails to river pools & waterfalls. This side of the forest has fewer visitors. There are no mosquitoes because a small tree frog eats the mosquito larva. It is a safe environment of pure air and water. We have no need for AC because we are at a cool 1,500 ft. above sea level. Our setting is enjoyed by children and adults

Name: Oreanda
Description: Enjoy enchanting, unobstructed views of the Caribbean Sea, eco-friendly simplicity, and island-style outdoor lounging. Perfectly located just a quiet mile from Esperanza, Oreanda offers all the best of Vieques: lounging by the pool, sensational sunsets, incredible hikes to Black Sand Beach, outdoor kitchen with grill, tennis and horseback riding nearby. Rent a bike to ride to Sun Bay or the Malecon, take a morning jog to Playa Grande or grab a good book and unwind. It’s all here: the perfect blend of hospitality, independence and nature therapy.

Name: Surf 787 Guest Villa
Description: The villa is a brand new, modern property with a swimming pool, yoga studio, game room, ocean views, BBQ hut, and parking for up to 10 vehicles. The activity room has a pool table, ping pong table, dartboard, board games, and video games.

Name: Beachside Villas Rincon
Description: Located on a quiet street by the beach, Beachside Villas, Rincon is a classic beach house in a tropical setting, fully furnished with everything your family will need for a wonderful Caribbean vacation. This Rincon Puerto Rico vacation rental is a comfortable family house, with a large private pool and plenty of outdoor space, our villa is a peaceful and relaxing base from which you and your family can explore Rincon & Puerta Rico's, Porta del Sol.

Name: Bosque Estatal de Guilarte
Description: The Guilarte State Forest is located in the municipality of Adjuntas, and it's managed by the Puerto Rico Department of Natural Resources (DRNA). In this forest, you'll find Puerto Rico's seventh highest peak, Pico Guilarte, at an elevation of 3,950 feet above the sea level. Due to its richness in local flora and fauna, the Guilarte State Forest is a great spot for hiking, birdwatching, photography, or simply for enjoying Puerto Rico's great outdoors.

Name: Fusion Beach Villas
Description: Fusion Beach Villas are located on 2 acres of lush, private oceanfront property just 1/2 mile west of popular Jobos Beach on Isabela’s magical coastline. Located near popular surf, windsurf, kite, bike, golf, horseback, dive, snorkel areas, we are just 10 minutes away from Borinquen airport in Aguadilla. On-site management office to address any special needs or requests you may have. There are 3 oceanfront vacation rental villas on the property: the LOFT and ONE bedroom boutique suite are located on the top floor; the garden studio is located on the ground floor.

Name: Hacienda Pomarrosa Villas
Description: Hacienda Pomarrosa is the coffee lover's ideal spot to stay. It's a coffee plantation mixed with a lodge experience right at the base of the highest peak in the island. This agro and ecotourism experience offers a selection of cabins to stay in and enjoy the surrounding nature, all while getting to know the house's signature coffee. Additionally, they offer a unique tour of how their coffee, Café Pomarrosa, is made. From planting to packaging, walk through the entire production process, and at the end, enjoy the taste of the final coffee drink product.

Name: Martineau Belle Playa - Vieques
Description: Martineau Belle Playa is a spectacular oceanfront luxury villa located inside the premises of the W Hotel, the most exclusive development in the island of Vieques, Puerto Rico. This Vieques villa rental is true oceanfront and only steps away from the beach. The elegant and modern decor inside combines with a genuine tropical setting outside to give Martineau Belle Playa its beautiful uniqueness and magic. Martineau Belle Playa is the most exclusive and best-reviewed beachfront villa in Vieques.

Name: RokaDura Villages
Description: Stay in a charming,relaxing place surrounded by nature in the center of the island just 1 minute from ZIPLINE TORO VERDE The space Rustic cottage style house. 2 bedrooms 3 full beds Guest access Enjoy and relax in the pool and visit our restaurant Other things to note We are 1 minute from Toro Verde Ziplines. There are different restaurants, fast food, pharmacies and supermarkets, all 1 to 2 minutes away from the cabin.

Name: Royal Isabela
Description: Escape to an intimate oceanfront resort on Puerto Rico’s spectacular northwest coast. Blessed with stunning Atlantic views, dramatic cliffs and a landscape lush with native flora and fauna, Royal Isabela is an epic backdrop for heartwarming family vacations, unforgettable golf getaways, romantic escapes, milestone celebrations, and gracious resort living. Enjoy the natural majesty of Isabela, Puerto Rico’s from your private Casita, as you play around on the Royal Isabela Golf Club, explore two miles of quiet beach or paddleboard on the mysterious Guajataca River.

Name: Sunset Paradise Villas
Description: Enjoy your own Private Oceanfront Villa, the perfect setting to witness the most beautiful Sunset in the Caribbean. Immersed in crystal-clear blue waters, Sunset Paradise Villas, is a unique property featuring 8 oceanfront units with their own balconies/terraces, fully furnished, air conditioned and completely equipped. Accommodations range from a 1 Bedroom Villa for 2 Guests, 4, 6, 8 and up to 10 Guests in a 5 Bedroom Villa. In its maximum capacity, the property could accommodate up to 50 Guests, when all 8 villas are rented simultaneously.

Name: Villa Herencia Hotel
Description: If we had to describe Villa Herencia Hotel in only two words, then elegance and coziness would be the ones to choose.
