Yes, it is an unconventional combination, but this hotel embodies both to perfection.Villa Herencia Hotel is a romantic boutique style hotel that offers a choice of eight comfortable and beautifully decorated rooms.

Name: Villa Mar Culebra
Description: Charming cozy apartment with views of Ensenada Honda located in a quiet residential area. The unit consists of a balcony facing the bay, fully equipped kitchen-living-dinning room, private bedroom and bath.

Name: Villa Ocean Mist
Description: Villa Ocean Mist is steps from Sandy Beach in Rincon, Puerto Rico, The Town of Beautiful Sunsets. The Villa has 3 Bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms, and 2 1/2 Bathrooms. Its centralized location makes the Villa walking distance to Tamboo Bar & Restaurant, Big Kahuna Burger Bar, and Casa Islena.

Name: Aguadilla Vacation Condo Rental Las Delicias
Description: Seven minutes from Rafael Hernandez (BQN) Airport in Aguadilla, this is an ideal location. From Las Delicias you’ll have access to the best beaches in the area. This corner of the world has it all..., the best weather, great sunsets, beautiful beaches, golf, scuba, fishing, surfing, kite surfing, bowling, and more; but best of all is the charm of the people of Puerto Rico.

Name: La Rosa de los Vientos
Description: This beach-side villa was actually an abandoned house before the owner decided to turn it into a tropical paradise guesthouse. A pink and white color scheme gives the property a vibrant and calm vibe.

Name: The Beach House - Rincón
Description: Enjoy all that Rincón, Puerto Rico has to offer. Stay in one of our private luxury rentals, dine on our fresh market-driven menu, enjoy the entertainment & have a drink on the beach!

Name: Centro Vacacional Boquerón
Description: Managed by the Puerto Rico National Park's Service, this unique cabins are situated near Boquerón beach in Cabo Rojo. All of their cabins have a maximum capacity of six people, and their prices range from $75 to $125 per night. In addition, they also have various event spaces for rent.

Name: Balneario Sun Bay
Description: Sun Bay Beach is an idyllic beach located on the south side of Vieques. The beach is managed by the Puerto Rico Department of Natural Resources, so it has a few "extras" that make it one of the island's most family-friendly beaches. The beach facilities include bathrooms, showers, changing rooms, BBQ grills, food kiosks, and more. Additionally, the beach has lifeguards on-site as well as security personnel. Camping on sun bay is possible, but it's important to keep in mind that a permit should be arranged in advance. Campsites are $10 per site per night

Name: Balneario Javier Calderón "Cerro Gordo"
Description: The Javier Calderón Balneario, better known as Cerro Gordo in Vega Alta, is a government-run beach administered by Puerto Rico's National Parks program. It is recognized, not only for its spectacular beach but also for its camping area, which has enough spaces for 95 tents. There are showers, bathrooms, food and drink kiosks, and multiple green areas. The camping spaces have to be reserved in advance through the National Park's program. The price for tent per night is $13.00 and prices for vehicles vary from motorbikes at $2.00, cars at $4.00 and buses at $5.00.

Name: Flamenco Beach
Description: Ranked as one of the top beaches in the world, Flamenco is a postcard-perfect stretch of white sand and turquoise waters. This beach is practically wave-less, which makes it ideal for snorkeling, swimming, unwinding, playing in the sand, or simply beach-bumming. Flamenco has amenities such as, lifeguards, camping area, showers, changing rooms and bathrooms, parking area, and kiosks where you can find authentic Puerto Rican food.

Name: Balneario La Monserrate (Balneario de Luquillo)
Description: Balneario La Monserrate is located in the eastern region of Puerto Rico, specifically in the town of Luquillo. The beach is managed by the Puerto Rico Department of Natural Resources, which means that the beach has a few extra "perks" that set it apart from most beaches in Puerto Rico. The facilities include bathrooms, showers, green areas, picnic areas, among others.

Name: Balneario Seven Seas
Description: The water in this beach is calm and crystal clear, making it a perfect spot for swimming and snorkeling. The facilities have bathrooms, showers, and BBQ areas. You can camp at this site for $10 a night per person with a minimum of two nights. There is also an area for trailer houses available to rent for a fee of $25 to $50 per day.

Name: Río Abajo State Forest
Description: The Río Abajo State Forest is located in the municipalities of Utuado and Arecibo, along the Tanamá River and Dos Bocas Lake. This state forest also offers great mountains for hiking, caves to explore, and diverse bird watching (including the Puerto Rican parrot). The camping area provides space for 40 people, the cost is $4.00 per person and $2.00 for minors. However, you need a permit to camp here that needs to be arranged previous to the camp date with the Puerto Rico Department of Natural Resources. Forest guides are available for rent in the area.

Name: Bosque Estatal de Susúa
Description: Located in the outskirts of Puerto Rico's central mountain range, the Susúa State Forest extends through the towns of Yauco and Sabana Grande. The forest has a visitor center, limited camping areas, and facilities for visitors.

Name: Bosque Estatal de Cambalache
Description: The Cambalache State Forest is located in the town of Arecibo and can be easily reached by taking Highway 22, which crosses through the northern side of the island. The forest has various hiking trails, gazebos, camping facilities, and on-site parking. The park is especially popular with mountain biking enthusiasts.

Name: Bosque del Pueblo
Description: Casa Pueblo offers guided tours through El Bosque del Pueblo, the forest lands that are under their protection. Visits to the forest have to be coordinated in advance, by calling the following number: (787) 829-4842. To camp in this paradisaical location is to delve into nature in its maximum splendor. The sounds, the stars, the smells, the flora, and the climate make the stay a mystical and unforgettable experience. Camping price for adults is $20.00 and $10.00 for children under 15 years old.

Name: Refugio de Vida Silvestre Embalse Lucchetti
Description: The Lucchetti Reservoir Wildlife Refuge is a great option for recreational fishing and other outdoor activities. The facilities include a recreational area with restrooms, bathrooms, gazebos, camping area, parking lot, boat ramp, and an area for fishing. The reservoir was built in 1952 to generate energy and potable water.

Name: Bosque Estatal De Carite
Description: This state forest extends through five municipalities in the southeast region of the island. One of forest most popular spots is the Charco Azul swimming hole, which can be reached after a short 20-minute hike through the forest.

Name: Hacienda La Mocha
Description: They are a family-owned sustainable coffee farm and eco-hotel. Also, they are honored to have been named a bird & butterfly sanctuary given the variety of these that live in La Mocha. Visit them and enjoy the grounds as part of one of their informative walking tours or stay and enjoy the full Hacienda La Mocha experience. Tour reservations have to be made in advance and be for 10 people or more.

Name: Hyatt Dorado Beach Resort & Country Club
Description: Fully restored after a $20 million renovation, the Hyatt Dorado Beach maintains its 40-year position as the Caribbean’s most exclusive beachfront resort, 22 miles from San Juan, 45 minutes from LMM Airport. Two Robert Trent Jones, Sr. Championship golf courses (Senior PGA 1999, 2000, 2001, Match Play Challenge). Spa, water sports, 8 restaurants, 7 tennis courts. Guests also enjoy all facilities of sister resort Hyatt Regency Cerromar Beach, a short, complementary shuttle ride away.

Name: Rincon of the Seas Grand Caribbean Hotel
Description: Rincón of the Seas – Grand Caribbean Hotel is a 112-room beachfront hotel located in Rincón, Puerto Rico, This is “The Land of Beautiful Sunsets” and “Surfing Capital of the Caribbean”. Enjoy casual elegance in a relaxed and natural setting. Their facilities include direct beach access, tropical gardens, free-forms swimming pool, restaurant, pool bar and banquet facilities.

Name: Casa Isleña Inn
Description: Luxurious beachfront accommodations in a small 9-room inn. Amenities include restaurant and swimming pool.

Name: Villa Cofresí Hotel & Restaurant
Description: Located right on the gorgeous Rincón Beach. Experience a complete vacation with exquisite restaurant, bar by the seas, beautiful rooms, breathtaking views and the most spectacular sunsets. Here at Villa Cofresi, the sunset is celebrated every day. When you arrive to your lobby, you feel you are coming into the living room of a friend’s house with the ocean at your feet. Our Caring staff that seems like family will take care of all your needs. Villa Cofresi is a playful resort, ideal for anyone in search a wonderful vacation where the beach rules and the fun never ends!

Name: Hacienda Tamarindo
Description: Hospitality… It’s our Nature. Vieques hotel, Hacienda Tamarindo, offers 17 very special hotel rooms, each lovingly and creatively designed and decorated by owner, Linda Vail – her swan song after 20 years as a commercial interior designer. Each guest room and public space is unique; imaginatively spiced with a lifetime’s accumulation of art, antiques and collectibles.

Name: Parador Palmas de Lucía
Description: Experience the essence of a beachfront relaxation at Parador Palmas de Lucía, a family-friendly hotel offering comfortable accommodations and affordable all-inclusive packages in the southeast of Puerto Rico. Our parador is ideal for family travel, group trips, corporate guests, honeymooners and a variety of other seaside events. Our air-conditioned restaurant seats up to 60 persons and has an additional open-air room with seating for 20 persons and is open to public seven days a week serving local cuisine, seafood and other food specialties. Our bar is located beside the pool.

Name: Blue Horizon Boutique Resort
Description: A ten room small luxury resort with a fine-dining restaurant. We specialize in small weddings (15-80 guests) and small meetings up to 30 people.

Name: Lazy Parrot Inn
Description: The Lazy Parrot is a unique 21-room inn, each room boasting its own tropical theme and equipped with a/c, cable TV and refrigerator. Their restaurant offers a garden dining experience complete with the sounds of the coquí, fresh fish and pastas. There's a waterfall pool and jacuzzi. Don’t miss it-it’s always squawking good!

Name: Mountain  Lodge Suites at Hacienda Carabalí
Description: Rainforest and Ocean View Inn at Hacienda Carabalí is the best choice for a small inn on the east side of Puerto Rico. Come and immerse yourself in pampered luxury that surpasses the standard offerings. We also offer informal bar and grill, and great evening dining at the Bamboo Terrace Restaurant. Great place for small meetings and destination weddings!

Name: Hacienda El Jibarito
Description: Hacienda el Jibarito is a hotel located in the mountainside of the lovely town of San Sebastián, on the west coast of Puerto Rico. It is an innovative project, unique in its class. It offers two interesting worlds to our visitors; tourism and agriculture. Once you go through the winding roads and arrive at the mountain top you experience great views. It is a beautiful small inn made up of individual cabins. We have suites and standard rooms available in the main building. We have 4 meetings rooms where you can celebrate events or special activities.

Name: Aquarius Vacation Club at Boquerón
Description: Tucked between a first-class private marina and one of Puerto Rico’s most popular and eco-friendly beaches, Boquerón Beach Resort mirrors the natural beauty and colorful charm of the island’s palm-lined southwestern tip and quaint village of Boquerón. Pairing spacious, kitchen-equipped villas, in a six story building, with casual poolside dining and playful activities for all ages, this relaxing resort is a mecca for families, boaters and bird-watchers, who come to see explore the region’s lush protected wildlife areas.

Name: Courtyard by Marriott Aguadilla
Description: Courtyard by Marriott, located in the beautiful west coast of Aguadilla, opened its doors to the public in 2008. Strategically located within a five-minute drive to the Rafael Hernández International Airport, and near frequently visited tourist destinations like the Ramey Base lighthouse ruins, golf courses, and beautiful surfer beaches. The hotel facilities include a 152 room capacity with four types of luxurious suites: the standard room, the superior room, the junior suites and finally the family suites.

Name: Parador MaunaCaribe
Description: Gorgeous beachfront panoramas can be yours when you stay at Parador MaunaCaribe, a property that blends the best beachfront location with plenty of opened green areas and a romantic "infinity" pool that provides the optical illusion of extending into the Caribbean Sea. Our 52 cozy and comfortable guestrooms are equipped with satellite TV, air conditioning, a small refrigerator, microwave oven, coffee maker, and a private bathroom housekeeping service daily. The parador features a billiard room, volleyball court, and hammocks.

Name: San Juan Airport Hotel
Description: Our award winning San Juan Airport Hotel is the only hotel located at the airport, just steps from the American Airlines counter. We have received the Best of the Best Award and Best of the Best 3 Star Hotel in Puerto Rico by the Puerto Rico Tourism Company. We offer great guest rooms and complimentary features including Hot Breakfast, a Business Center, Board Meeting Room, High-Speed Internet, (Wi-Fi) Wireless Connection, a Fully equipped Fitness Center facility, FREE 800 and local telephone calls, and a On-Site Full Service Restaurant/Bar.

Name: Casa de Cesar
Description: In Casa de Cesar ("House of Cesar") you will find the perfect place to stay while visiting the mountains of the center of the Island in Jayuya. Cesar invites you to visit his home.

Name: Combate Guest House
Description: close to the beach and

Name: Wildflowers Guest House
Description: no info

Name: Wyndham Palmas Beach & Golf Resort
Description: Escape to Humacao’s beautiful resort community of Palmas del Mar for a relaxing stay at the contemporary Wyndham Palmas Beach & Golf Resort. Offering all-inclusive and room-only options, our non-smoking hotel is ideal for vacation and business travelers. Go for a refreshing swim in two outdoor pools, indulge in Puerto Rican cuisine and Caribbean cocktails at eight restaurants and bars, and retreat to spacious accommodations appointed with everything you need.

Name: Hotel Parador Baños de Coamo
Description: Coamo Hot Springs are open. Recorded Temporarily Closed - 20/11/2018

Name: Casa Grande Mountain Retreat
Description: Set in a stunning valley on 105 lush tropical acres, Casa Grande Mountain Retreat is an oasis of peace and tranquility. The former coffee plantation, now exquisitely landscaped, has 20 rooms scattered up the mountainside with a beautiful river as the lower border. Each room has its own en-suite bathroom, private porch, and hammock. A salt-water swimming pool is cradled beneath a green mountain vista. A fully equipped yoga center is used for individual and group practice. The restaurant serves fresh farm-to-table cuisine.

Name: SeaGate Hotel
Description: For over 40 years, the award-winning SeaGate Hotel has been a beautiful, eclectic refuge in the country. SeaGate overlooks the ocean and surrounding hills & treetops of Vieques which includes views of the historic Fort Conde de Mirasol. SeaGate Hotel is truly a unique space, with no two rooms exactly alike. Notable features are air-conditioning, kitchenettes (select rooms), patios/balconies & ocean views. We provide WiFi access & a knowledgeablefriendly staff. We provide expert advice on where to go & what to do in Vieques.

Name: Parador Villa Parguera
Description: Parador Villa Parguera is one of the most complete and attractive parador (country inn) in Puerto Rico. Its beautiful and comfortable rooms, of which many have a balcony bordered by the imposing Caribbean Sea, blend into the patio between tropical palm trees and gardens that give a natural enchantment to our Parador.

Name: 4 Casitas Bed and Breakfast
Description: 4 Casitas is nestled in the foothills on the southwest corner of Puerto Rico. It is a unique eco-friendly community consisting of four cottages (casitas) and the main farm house (casa) making it an ideal location for a relaxing vacation.
Street Address: Carretera 300, km 2.3, Bario Llanos Tuna, Sector La Capilla

Name: Parador El Faro
Description: Parador El Faro, a 75 room and a 16-acre estate feet opened in 1991 as an independent inn in Aguadilla, Puerto Rico. Parador El Faro amenities include two outdoor swimming pools and an on-site restaurant that offers a Puerto Rican and international style cuisine. If you are a dog lover, you are in luck; Parador el Faro is the only dog-friendly hotel managed by IHP Hospitality. The hotel is strategically located in the center of Aguadilla making it easy for guests to explore and discover the wonders that the West side of the island has to offer them.
Street Address: 4000 Av. Dr. Pedro Albizu Campos, Aguadilla Pueblo

Name: Hotel Lucía Beach
Description: Experience the essence of beachfront relaxation at Hotel Lucía Beach, a family- friendly hotel offering comfortable accommodations and affordable all-inclusive packages in southeast Puerto Rico. Our hotel is ideal for family travel, group trips, honeymoons or a variety of other seaside events.

Name: Treasure Island Hotel & Villas
Description: Discover the history and the natural beauty at our historic hotel in the mountains of Cidra, Puerto Rico! Since 1930, we have been the perfect refuge for those seeking a unique natural experience. We have 20 rooms and 16 villas, each with its charm and character. We are surrounded by a beautiful lake, allowing you to enjoy stunning panoramic views from the comfort of your villa. We also offer kayaks so you can explore the lake and enjoy the serenity of the water.

Name: O:LV Fifty Five
Description: Standing out from the massive resorts, this adults-only hotel, O:LV Fifty Five is the new sister hotel (or more like its sleek, tall, handsome brother) of O:live Boutique Hotel. Located right between the Condado Lagoon and steps from the beach, and with loads of city swagger, O:LV Fifty Five is a sophisticated city tower styled from the ground up by design powerhouse responsible for winning The Best Design Hotel of the World and Best New Boutique Hotel by London’s Boutique Hotel Awards.

Name: Parador El Buen Café
Description: Located in Hatillo, Parador El Buen Café is in the city center. Arecibo Observatory and Arecibo Lighthouse are local landmarks, and the area's natural beauty can be seen at Rio Camuy Cave Park and Caño Tiburones Nature Reserve, minutes away from the Estatua de Cristobal Colón. Along with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has an outdoor pool and a business center. Free WiFi in public areas and free self-parking are also provided. Additionally, there's a conference space, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff are onsite.

Name: Posada Que Chévere Rincón!
Description: Qué Chévere Posada Hotel, located in a historic building right on the Plaza in the Center of Rincon, offers 11 individually decorated guest rooms with French balconies overlooking the Plaza or the hills/garden and two larger family suites. The goal of a Puerto Rican posada is to give visitors an opportunity to experience the culture, history and the architecture of the posada’s urban environment. It was with this in mind that the hotel was designed and decorated. Qué Chévere offers two room types.

Name: A 2 tiempos AyS Bed and Breakfast
Description: It gives us great pleasure to welcome you to our home, the National Historic Landmark, “Casa Jaime Acosta y Fores”. Enjoy at A 2 Tiempos Bed and Breakfast the unique experience of staying at a hundred-year-old architectural masterpiece. Each room boasts glorious hand-painted stencils, the only ones in existence in the Caribbean. We have furnished our home to the style of the era, giving the opportunity to relive the feeling of tranquility and quiet elegance of the 1900s.

Name: Casa Campo Bed & Breakfast
Description: Located in San Sebastian, Puerto Rico, Casa Campo offers its guests a relaxing environment with all the amenities. Each room features a private balcony, refrigerator, microwave, free Wi-Fi, Internet TV and a spacious bathroom. Casa Campo features a complete fresh daily breakfast and unlimited access to the pool area where guest can relax under the sun. Guest can read books and watch TV in the lounge area or visit all the beaches and adventures that are near by. There is no other place like Casa Campo.

Name: The Vieques Guesthouse
Description: The Vieques Guesthouse is a fun and relaxed 12-room guesthouse in Esperanza, featuring Caribbean Sea views, with close proximity to the Malecón and beaches (a 3- to 5-minute walk), eliminating the need for a rental car. We offer many different room types, from a standard room with one queen bed to a 2-bedroom apartment with a full kitchen. All of our rooms feature AC, new furniture/linens, mini-fridges, microwaves (two of our rooms have full kitchens), safes, fans, and 43" TVs with 120+ satellite TV channels.

Name: Isla Hermosa Guesthouse
Description: Quiet, private, just off the beaten path 4 room, 5 bed, guesthouse. Each room has its own private bathroom. Shared outdoor kitchen area and shared a living area with a TV and half bathroom.

Name: Villa Ensenada
Description: A little off the beaten path of Puerto Rico’s sunset coast, this stress-free oasis was created beside a beach that the locals have pretty much kept to themselves. Discover the pleasures of a relaxing place that you can call your home. Spend your evenings in your balcony sitting in a wicker chair and watching breath taking sunsets on another perfect day.

Name: BirdNest Studio
Description: Birdnestudios are two well designed independent studios decorated to our tropical style. Colorful and spacious. We are perched on the side of a mountain on a 1-acre plot overlooking the Vieques channel and El Yunque mountains. We are near Vieques two main towns, Isabel ll, and Esperanza. We are also located 1 mile from the most popular beaches. We have a breath taking view and lots of tranquility. Our trade winds are always present and caring for our Nest. We have two units for your choice, Gaviota, sleeps 6 (two bedrooms 1 a/c) and Pitirre, a fully equipped studio, which sleeps 4.

Name: Jardín del Mar Guesthouse
Description: Jardin del mar guesthouse, located at the coastal town of Hatillo. It offers an economic and accessible stay close to beaches, malls, stores, highways and tourist spots. The property is around 22.5 km from Arecibo Observatory, 24.1 km from Rio Camuy Cave Park and 12.9 km from Arecibo Lighthouse & Historical Park. Both private parking and free WiFi are accessible at the guesthouse. Complete with a private bathroom, the rooms at Jardin del Mar Guesthouse come with air conditioning, and certain rooms have a seating area.

Name: San Sebastián Bed & Breakfast
Description: San Sebastián Bed & Breakfast is a warm and quiet home run by a very hospitable family who is eager to share their lifestyle. This bed and breakfast is a clean, friendly, and welcoming place. The owners offer customized service, delicious daily breakfast, and travel guides to explore the town, which is full of history, museums, natural attractions, incredible views, and more. You can enjoy, within the property's walking distance, unique museums, local shops, restaurants, and a friendly environment.

Name: Villa Larisa
Description: 5 Bedroom "Villa Larisa" in Dorado Beach East: Seldom will you find a home more beautifully designed and exquisitely appointed than “Villa Larisa”, a 5-bedroom Vacation Paradise nestled on the beautiful Dorado Beach Resort and Club Property - one of the world’s finest tourist beach destinations. In “Villa Larisa” you’ll discover the style and genuine class firmly positioned at the top end of the range of Villas we offer. It's perfect for those who also desire easy access to the beach, pools, water playground, dining, shopping and nightlife.

Name: Villa Legends
Description: Washed by cool ocean breezes, 3-Bedroom “Villa Legends” is nestled on the beautiful Dorado Beach Resort and Club Property - one of the world’s finest tourist beach destinations. The design maximizes privacy, provides a tropical haven, all while residing in this sun-kissed, sandy-beach community. Living here is a tropical delight, perfect for those who desire easy access to the beach, dining, shopping and nightlife. Whichever way you look at it, this is Paradise. This distinctly tropical, 2-story, stand-alone, luxury Villa offers:

Name: Villa Loyda
Description: "Villa Loyda" at Embassy Suites, Dorado. The origin of “Loyda” is “Queen of Beauty” (going back to Helen of Troy!) and “Villa Loyda” is indeed located in a community known for its beauty: The Dorado Del Mar Resort in Puerto Rico - also recognized for cleanliness and excellent security.

Name: Villa Serena
Description: Location! Location! Location! Luxurious three-story "Villa Serena" has “IT”!

Name: Villa Searenity
Description: 5 Bedroom Villa Searenity in Dorado Beach East. A famous thespian once said: “What we are all looking for is happiness - and if we could achieve a little piece of that each day - they would be called moments of serenity.” Well, you’ve found it: “Villa Searenity” - an oasis of serenity in a chaotic world - and not for just a moment, but all day long!

Name: Villa Coral Reef
Description: 4-Bedroom "Villa Coral Reef": Located in a preferred destination for visitors to the Caribbean Islands. Exciting tropical architecture, uniquely beautiful beaches, and, of course, the internationally renown, vacation-destination town of Dorado; launch pad to the island’s celebrated attractions.

Name: Villa Brisas Del Mar
Description: "Villa Brisas del Mar" at Embassy Suites: “Brisas Del Mar” means “Sea Breezes” which waft from the sea through this beautiful Villa which overlooks the Atlantic Ocean and is located in a community known for its beauty, cleanliness and security - the Embassy Suites Resort in Puerto Rico. Enjoy access to the resort beach and restaurants, coming home to your spacious and breezy ocean view villa.

Name: Villa Galtero
Description: 2BR Villa Galtero - Dorado Beach Resort. Experience the peace and tranquility of 3-Bedroom “Villa Galtero” - located at “The Greens” in the Community of The Dorado Beach Resort. This charming Villa is just a short walk to the resort’s “West Beach” where the sunsets over the Atlantic Ocean are amazing!

Name: Villa Aurora
Description: Aurora is a sunny, well designed, three-bedroom Villa located in the world-renown vacation destination of Dorado, Puerto Rico in the heart of the Dorado Beach Embassy Suites resort. From its balcony and patio, enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of the golden-sand beach ... just steps away.

Name: Villa Bella Mar
Description: “Bella Mar” is Spanish for “Beautiful Ocean” and “Villa Bella Mar” unquestionably deserves the name because you’ll enjoy spectacular panoramic views of the golden-sand beach ... so close you’ll feel you could almost dive into the waves directly from your balcony! The community has its own large pool and toddler pool accessible 24/7.

Name: Villa Granada
Description: 3 Bedroom “Villa Granada” at “The Greens” in the Community of the Dorado Beach Resort: Spectacular ocean views from a villa designed with families in mind. This Villa is the perfect setting for your getaway, furnished with all you need for a comfortable and convenient stay, while 24-hour security gives you peace of mind.

Name: Villa Arrecife
Description: Villa Arrecife defines the magic of Dorado, Puerto Rico, one of tropical Puerto Rico’s most iconic beach resort towns. It is a 2-story, four-bedroom, luxury stand-alone beach house within the Dorado Reef community, adjacent to the Dorado Beach Resort. Enjoy a short walk or golf cart ride to the DR community tennis courts or to the sparkling pool and beach club, overlooking the ocean, and feel your worries melt away! There are championship golf courses nearby as well as world-class restaurants, spas, water sports facilities and shops catering to every taste and need.

Name: Villa Galante
Description: 2-Bedroom "Villa Galante": The moments of happiness we enjoy often take us by surprise - and so it is with “Villa Galante” - a unique gem located at “The Greens” in the Community of the Dorado Beach Resort. You’ll be surprised at how close you are to fabulous beaches as well as a 5-star resort.

Name: Villa Gemma
Description: “Villa Gemma” is the result of luxury island living and serene relaxation, indoors and out - all within a few minutes’ walk to gorgeous white-sand beaches. The villa is located in the Dorado Beach Resort Community with breathtaking panoramas of blue ocean and sky, together with spacious living areas. Ground floor entry one story, 2-Bedroom Vacation Paradise “Villa Gemma” - is fabulous in so many ways and offers:

Name: Villa Fairways
Description: 1-Bedroom "Villa Fairways" in Dorado Beach: You have reached Paradise! This one-bedroom, one-and-a-half-bathroom luxury Villa is located in the heart of the Dorado Beach Resort and Club property in Dorado Beach. The Villa is fully air-conditioned, has palm-tree landscaping, and is within walking distance of many conveniences – including the unique “Spa Botanica”. Get around in your own personal 4-seater golf cart as the entire resort covers 1,500 acres and includes miles of beautiful trails for golf cart exploring, biking, walking, or jogging.

Name: Villa Fantasía
Description: 3 BR Villa Fantasia at Dorado Beach. There is something about the Caribbean which drives many of us to relinquish all we know for the promise of a dream. Welcome to your dream -- your corner of Paradise -- your fantasy -- aptly named “Villa Fantasía”.

Name: Villa Flamingo
Description: 3 BR "Villa Flamingo" at Dorado Beach. This is a luxury, 3-Bedroom, ground entry, two story Villa located at The Fairways in the heart of Dorado Beach Resort and Club. It is only a 35 minute drive from the capital, San Juan and is close to one of the most beautiful beaches on the island. Dorado itself is filled with world-renown restaurants and close to many amenities.

Name: Villa Antonio
Description: 4 BR Villa Antonio on Cerro Gordo Beach. YES - count them: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ... just five steps from this Caribbean Island’s beautiful white-sand, calm-water beaches. This once-in-a-lifetime Vacation Villa destination offers: STUNNING PANORAMIC OCEAN VIEWS and... Sleeps up to 8 guests in four bedrooms: • Master Bedroom: En-suite; Queen Bed, Two Closets • Bedroom 2: Queen Bed plus closet, 6-seater couch • Bedroom 3: Queen Bed plus closet • Bedroom 4: Full Bed plus a Twin Bed and large, convenient Armoire.

Name: Villa Mila
Description: 4-Bedroom "Villa Mila" in Cerro Gordo: The Villa is superbly located in an enviable position — being located just steps from the island’s beautiful white-sand, Cerro Gordo beach; mere minutes from world-class restaurants, golf courses, hotels, and local facilities; superb scenic walking paths and biking trails with amazing views. And close by: The vacation destination of Dorado, with its shopping, world-class restaurants, and multiple facilities. You'll be struck by the stunning, panoramic ocean-views and realize what a spectacular location you have chosen for your vacation!

Name: Villa Nurlan
Description: 3 BR —Villa Nurlan at Lakeside Villas

Name: Villa Oleana
Description: 3 Bedroom "Villa Oleana" at Lakeside Villas: Villa Oleana is the ultimate vacation home, personified in a contemporary Mediterranean style. This 3-bedroom 3-bathroom Villa, in a secure and gated community, offers guests expansive views of the surrounding lakes and gardens as well as magnificent tropical sunsets which end each perfect day. After swimming, hiking, caving, exploring - or whatever your heart desires - come “home” to unwind in sheer comfort. This fully air-conditioned, ground-entry, single story Villa offers:

Name: Villa Aguataine
Description: 1BR Villa Aguataine at Dorado Beach Resort - sleeps up to two adults and two children. Picture yourself in a peaceful, Caribbean, luxury Villa with a touch of French Riviera flare, in the lap of a tropical paradise, in a world-renown and sought-after RESORT vacation destination, and you’re in: “Villa Aguataine”.

Name: Villa Bella Vista
Description: 3BR "Villa Bella Vista" at Dorado Beach Resort is casually elegant - with all rooms uniquely appointed with exquisite artwork and furnishings. You’ll feel like your ARE in Paradise! Experience the harmony and serenity of this 3-Bedroom Villa located at “The Greens” in the Community of the Dorado Beach Resort.

Name: Villa Chocolarte
Description: 2-Bedroom "Villa Chocolarte" at Dorado Beach Resort: Chocolate, the sweet cure-all, is said to boost your mood, heart health, and mind. So too will its namesake Vacation Villa: “Villa Chocolarte”. This is a stunning two-bedroom villa located in the Greens Community of the Dorado Beach Resort with lake and partial ocean views.

Name: Villa Giovanni
Description: 2 BR "Villa Giovanni" at Lakeside Villas. A vacation of adventure or a vacation of relaxation - have both! Head for the rain forests, spectacular caves, thriving entertainment – or strike a happy medium – all this when you rent "Villa Giovanni" – a holiday home in a world-renown resort area near Dorado, Puerto Rico.

Name: Villa Gran Vista
Description: 3 Bedroom "Villa Gran Vista" at Lakeside Villas:

Name: Villa Guayaba
Description: 2BR "Villa Guayaba" at Lakeside Villas. A cozy, Vacation Villa surrounded by lush, green palm-tree landscaped gardens adorned with lakes, fountains and irresistible pools. Just like its Caribbean namesake "Guayaba" (Guava in English) this is a "sweet home-base" located in a green, tropical Paradise.

Name: Villa Ileana
Description: 3 BR —"Villa IIeana" at Lakeside Villas. There is no doubt you’ve arrived in Paradise. You're bound to enjoy this Villa - from it's bright and sunny interior to its relaxing, picturesque terrace with plenty of seating and partial ocean views. You're just a short, one-minute walk to a beautiful white-sand beach. Put yourself in this Villa and the cares of the world evaporate – you’re “home” — welcome! This Villa is truly “cool!” This second floor Villa offers:

Name: Villa Iris
Description: 3 Bedroom "Villa Iris" at Lakeside Villas. “Iris” means “Rainbow” in Greek and there’s a pot of gold at the end of THIS rainbow — called “Villa Iris” — a vacation home located in the heart of Lakeside Villa’s peaceful and secure gated community in Dorado. Surrounded by tropical gardens, lakes, and water fountains, “Villa Iris” offers ocean views from its ground floor patio and second-floor balcony. You’re just steps from the beach and pools - and only a short drive from Puerto Rico’s adventures, sports activities, sights, and nightlife. This ground-entry, two-story Villa offers:

Name: Villa Catalina
Description: 2 BR Villa Catalina at Lakeside Villas, surrounded by palm-tree landscaped gardens, lakes, fountains and an irresistible pool - is your family-friendly vacation destination ... nestled in the gated, beach-front community of Lakeside.

Name: Villa Concha
Description: 2 BR Villa Concha at Lakeside Villas It is a popular folk myth that if you hold a conch shell to your ear, you can hear the sound of the ocean. “Villa Concha” GOES ONE BETTER! It’s a three-minute walk to white, sandy beaches where you can relax and enjoy the sun, or swim in the warm, Caribbean, crystal-clear waters FOR REAL!

Name: Villa De Palma
Description: “Villa De Palma” is a luxurious, Mediterranean-style, beach vacation home in the heart of Lakeside Villa’s peaceful and secure gated community. The Villa, nestled in magnificent gardens and surrounded by beautiful water fountains and lakes, with an under two-minute walk to beaches, pools, and tennis, can be described in one word: Paradise.

Name: Villa Fortuna
Description: 3 Bedroom - Villa Fortuna at Lakeside Villas: Lakeside Villas is nestled in the Dorado Beach area of Puerto Rico, and in the heart of Lakeside Villas is “Villa Fortuna”. Being surrounded by landscaped gardens, pristine lakes and fountains, have truly earned this location the right to be called “Paradise”. This ground-entry, one-story Villa offers: Sleeps up to 6 guests in three bedrooms with three bathrooms • Master Bedroom en-suite: 4-Poster King Bed, Flat-screen TV • Second Bedroom en suite: King Bed • Third Bedroom: Two Twin beds

Name: Villa Gardenia
Description: 3 BR Villa Gardenia at Lakeside Villas. Pamper yourselves. Book your next vacation to this sanctuary of contemporary design featuring a spacious living room, patio overlooking the ocean and surrounded by lush, palm-tree gardens, lakes, and fountains. From its bright and sunny interior to its relaxing terrace, this Villa is a short one-minute walk from Dorado’s world-renown beaches. You’re in the luxury of your own villa – complete privacy and absolute tranquility – and you are fully and adequately “pampered”.

Name: El San Geronimo Hotel
Description: San Geronimo Hotel welcomes you to enjoy our Chic Boutique aesthetic and comfortable accommodations in the heart of one of the most historic settlements in the Americas. Take in the Caribbean beaches, vibrant colors, and culinary delights that make Puerto Rico world-famous, all while staying within convenient distance of the Puerto Rico Convention Center, the San Juan Cruise Port, and Luis Muñoz Marín International Airport.

Name: El Cerro
Description: You have arrived at El Cerro, the retreat sitting on the hill overlooking Esperanza Village. This is a privately-owned retreat with views of the Caribbean Sea. With three separate houses on 30 acres, it is the perfect accommodations for any group and a breathtaking spot for any event.

Name: Paradise Villas & Vacations
Description: Welcome to Paradise Villas & Vacations We serve one of the world’s most sought-after vacation destinations – Dorado, Puerto Rico. PV&V is a travel agency, trip advisor, and expert villa rental resource with Alma Bair, G.M., at your service. We focus on all aspects of your vacation experience to make it extraordinary. Dorado Beach offers beautiful, golden-sand-warm-water beaches, with a range of activities and amenities, world-class restaurants, famous golf courses, and more.

Name: Villa Cuqui
Description: Villa Cuqui offers a rare blend of modern elegance and an unbeatable beachfront location on Rincón's most famous beach, Sandy Beach. Fully redecorated and refurnished in early-2019, with high ceilings, dramatic ocean views, and abundant natural light. The soft white linens make sleep a thing to look forward to, while the fully-stocked gourmet kitchen makes it tempting to forgo the many within-walking-distance restaurants in favor of a meal at home. From the ocean-facing balcony, enjoy watching the beach-goers/surfers by day and the starlit sand by night.

Name: Casa Wilson Inn
Description: We are a friendly, family-run hotel for friends from near and far. We provide all the amenities of home with the convenience and accessibility of Condado Puerto Rico. Built in the 1920s and remodeled in 2019. The property has been transformed into a 13 room urban bungalow-style guest house set amidst lush gardens. Casa Wilson is located on Wilson Avenue, a few blocks from downtown, “La Ventana del Mar”, beautiful beaches, restaurants and more. All in the heart of San Juan’s most popular neighborhood Condado.

Name: Seas the Day
Description: “Seas the Day” is a newly finished private home directly on Sandy Beach in beautiful Rincon, Puerto Rico. No expense spared, this stunning home is sure to fulfill. With the option of renting only the first 2 floors (5 bedrooms, 2 baths) or including the owner’s third-floor penthouse suite (6 bedrooms, 3 baths) we can comfortably host your specific group (up to 15 people max). From the state of the art kitchen to the infinity pool, everything is brand new and awaiting your stay.

Name: Sandy Beach Villa
Description: Located on beautiful Sandy Beach, this villa is the perfect property for your Rincon excursion. Its modern decor and extent of amenities provide the perfect atmosphere and comfort you desire on your get-away vacation. The villa is within walking distance of shopping and local restaurants, including the lively beachfront bar and grill, Tamboo, just a couple hundred yards up the road.

Name: Paradise at Sandy Beach
Description: This is life on the Beach in Rincon! Wake up & check the surf without leaving the bedroom. Watch Humpback whales frolic from late January through early April from your dining table. Walk to great dining & nightlife. Can it get any better? 3-7 night minimum stay depending on the time of year and availability, inquire for exceptions and Holiday rates vary, inquire for specifics.

Name: Casa Piedras
Description: Casa Piedras is located in a small quiet neighborhood only 2 blocks from Tres Palmas Marine Reserve. Enjoy the rooftop area for a spectacular ocean view during the day or for star gazing at night. With its great decor and numerous amenities, you will be sure to make the most of your stay.

Name: Vista del Mar y Sol - Unit 206
Description: Located directly on the Tres Palmas Marine Reserve, less than a mile from the main town of Rincon you can be close to it all, yet removed at the same time. Be comfortable! This apartment has more than just a great location with air condition in all rooms, washer/dryer, cable TV, wireless internet, fully equipped kitchen, ocean view balcony, and a swimming pool. Walk to one of the local bars/restaurants or stay in and grill out with your private gas grill while watching the sunset from the balcony. Come to experience Rincon and all it has to offer!

Name: Vista del Mar y Sol - Unit 105
Description: Located directly on the Tres Palmas Marine Reserve, less than a mile from the main town of Rincon you can be close to it all, yet removed at the same time. Be comfortable! This apartment has more than just a great location with air condition in all rooms, washer/dryer, cable TV, wireless internet, fully equipped kitchen, private porch, and a swimming pool.

Name: Ocean View Rustic Retreat
Description: Enjoy this House with private gated parking, an amazing view and plenty of amenities. Within walking distance of numerous bars/restaurants, gift shops and more this property puts you directly in the Rincon culture!

Name: Kare Management
Description: Having over 15 years of experience with Rincón and it's beautiful homes we are happy to help find your perfect getaway!

Name: Hacienda Tres Casitas
Description: Hacienda Tres Casitas is a family-run property between the towns of Cabo Rojo and San Germán that offers visitors a unique opportunity to connect with nature while enjoying the perks of a full glamping experience. A stay at Hacienda Tres Casitas includes all the things you love most but with the bonus of having the amenities and convenience of a regular hotel room.

Name: Trópica Beach Hotel
Description: Trópica Beach Hotel invites you to take an immersive culinary and chic experience with funky/boho enriched design in harmony with exceptional service and some of the best eats Puerto Rico has to offer. Located in the heart of Condado, steps away from one of the most renowned beaches in the area, the Trópica experience is designed to treat all your senses. From the comfort of our sleek rooms and common areas to the unique culinary experience Chef Atisha Pascual brings to your table.

Name: Aloft San Juan
Description: Aloft San Juan is a vibrant modern hotel located in Distrito T-Mobile, Puerto Rico´s new entertainment hub, catering to travelers looking for a lively social scene. We are located near Miramar, Old San Juan and the Condado beach. Our guests will enjoy our loft-inspired design, free Wi-Fi and the technology to bring people together. Our San Juan pet friendly hotel is the perfect accommodations for you and your furry friend. At WXYZ® bar, we create the right atmosphere to mingle and enjoy the music over our original and classic cocktails.

Name: East Hollow de Vieques
Description: Located on the north shore of Vieques, PR, this home has sweeping panoramic ocean views of The Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico. Paraiso is a 4 Bedroom (all ensuite), 5 Bath Private Estate Home with Heated Pool, Gourmet Kitchen & Summer kitchen, state of the art audio and visual media system, and magnificent gathering areas. The home sleeps a maximum of 8 persons, our minimum stay is 5 nights

Name: Puertas @ El Quenepo
Description: Sitting pretty above the Caribbean Sea on the Malecón in the heart of the lively village of Esperanza, Puertas at El Quenepo refined, classic spirit reflects its surroundings. Design details include Caribbean artwork, antique furniture from Puerto Rico and the American South and soft, natural elements to create a sense of timeless design. The atmosphere is intimate and fun, inviting you to explore the island of Vieques, Puerto Rico where the Caribbean sun flows into Bioluminescent nights.

Name: Camping Site - Toro Negro State Forest
Description: If you're planning a weekend getaway in nature, we suggest you head over to the Bosque Toro Negro Camping Site. For an accessible price, you can stay on the camping grounds, which are just a few minutes away from the amazing La Confesora, a refreshing pond where you can swim and have a great time with family or friends. You can also visit the forest observation tower, which is more than 3,500 feet above sea level. The grounds have a few gazebos with picnic tables, sinks, running water, barbecues, and places for campfires.

Name: Vive La Van Inc.
Description: LIVE THE EXPERIENCE! We want to help you to explore The Island! Our Van is fully equipped for your adventure. It is a hotel on wheels, which will allow you to enjoy the freedom of nature with luxuries and comforts. It is a unique experience in Puerto Rico, and we are happy to bring it to you!

Name: Sunny Side Vacational Home
Description: Short-term rentals located just steps from El Combate Beach and the Cabo Rojo National Wildlife Reserve. Our cozy modern villas can accommodate five to seven people, and amenities include a 32” LED TV with Dish, wi-fi connection, BBQ area, and a shared pool. Guests of the villas can spend their time doing outdoor activities, just steps from our facilities there is a passive area with a basketball court and a playground for children. In the beach area, you can rent jet skis, kayaks, or bring snorkeling gear to explore the shore.

Name: Sierra Palms
Description: Sierra Palms is a walled property with two structures. One unit is a 3-bedroom, 3 bath house. The other, The Triplex at ground level has a 2,000 sq. ft. activity room. There are 3 rooms on the two lower levels. There is off-street parking for three cars and a private path to the river. The nearest restaurants are 15-20 minutes away. There is a kitchen for guests where they can prepare their own food with their own supplies.
Street Address: Rd. 191 Km 7.9 Sector Cubuy BO Rio Blanco

Name: Casa Columbia
Description: Styled after a Tuscan villa, Casa Columbia is four levels of island chic. Arched windows frame bird’s eye ocean views. Whitewashed rooms open to outdoor space on every level. Turkish travertine tile is used exclusively creating a continuous flow from room to room. All new appliances and furnishings, air conditioning and ceiling fans in all rooms.

Name: Casa Cumbre
Description: Casa Cumbre is a premier short-term rental villa located in Vieques. Cumbre is located in the hills of Los Chivos with unparalleled views of both the Caribbean Sea, bays, and the Atlantic Ocean. The property has 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, sleeping 6 person total, with 2 bedrooms with en suite baths. ACs in bedrooms can provide cooling although the house captures the breezes. Convenient center island location. Pool with 6 lounge chairs and infinity lip provides amazing views and relaxation. There are plenty of covered patios, private porches, and lounging space for your group.

Name: Sandia Beach House
Description: A vibrant and comfortable beach house with all the amenities just steps from the beach in Monte Santo Playa neighborhood. The property has ocean views, a 40' pool, 4 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms. Three of the bedrooms and two bathrooms are in the main house. The cabana/Studio with a private entrance has its own bathroom. Amenities include AC throughout, wifi, SmartTV, outdoor shower, propane grill, electric gate, and amazing high definition sunrises and sunsets from the dining & rooftop decks. Large entertainment and grill space below on the pool deck allow for even rainy day retreats.

Name: Aloft Ponce Hotel & Casino
Description: Modern spaces, open thinking, and open expression prevail at Aloft Ponce. Our hotel offers a wide selection of high technology and high-touch amenities, as well as an unparalleled location right in the heart of Ponce. Just a few distances, you'll discover attractions such as The Art Museum of Ponce, Castle Museum Serralles, or Park of Bombas. Explore a variety of well-regarded restaurants in the area, or stop by Nook Restaurant, our on-site restaurant, open from breakfast through dinner. We serve a delectable menu, full of simple dishes with fresh new twists, that can be enjoyed.

Name: Costa Bahía Hotel at Paseo Caribe
Description: Welcome to Costa Bahía Hotel - Paseo Caribe, where you will enjoy our spacious suites-style rooms that are fully furnished, with a comfy bed, air conditioning, free WIFI, kitchenette, television with cable, GYM, and a stunning view of the Condado Lagoon.

Name: West Indies Vacation Rentals
Description: We manage over 150 properties in Puerto Rico and are one of the largest Airbnb Superhosts in the Caribbean. All of our properties are expertly maintained and marketed. We offer a team of expertly trained reservation desk, 5-star housekeeping, and industry-leading guest services. Guests will receive top-notch service from the moment they inquire about the property until the day they check out. We want to make your experience the best it can be!

Name: Casa del Campo
Description: Single story, 3+ 1 bedrooms (Beds: 1 queen, 2 full and 1 futon in 4th room), 1.5 baths, large kitchen, and large living room, carport. The house porch continuously wraps around the front, right side, and rear of the home. A/C in each bedroom, ceiling fans in every room of the house, washer, and dryer. Large front and backyard (slopes downhill). The entire home is fenced in. Casa del Campo is located on the northwest side of the city of Quebradillas. It is close to the ocean. Surrounding cities include Hatillo, Isabela, Aguadilla, and Rincon.

Name: Palacio Provincial San Juan, Curio Collection by Hilton
Description: Nestled right in the middle of 500-year-old Colonial Old San Juan within walking distance to attractions and the best culinary fare, Palacio Provincial features a location that is incomparable. New life has been breathed into the impressive, historic building, redesigned in a cosmopolitan style with modern amenities and a variety of rooms and suites accompanied by exceptional service. Please contact us with any questions about our hotel or facilities, and a member of our staff will respond to you shortly.

Name: Casa Campo Obymar
Description: Casa Campo Obymar is a private chalet located atop a small mountain in the town of Moca. The chalet has a private pool and it offers visitors a unique experience in Puerto Rico's countryside, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. At this spectacular rental, you'll enjoy panoramic views, while also feeling connected to the area's natural surroundings. At night, the experience turns even more magical with the Island's coquí frog singing its singular tune, the clear sky showing the milky way in all its splendor.

Name: Hotel Libertad
Description: A unique experience at the beginning of Puerto Rican historical culture, Hotel Libertad is located in Lares Puerto Rico. In 1868 a group of "Criollos" decided that it was time to ask for independence from Spain. This is called "El Grito de Lares" and it happened just a few steps from the hotel. Relive that moment by staying at our cozy hotel. Ample parking, wi-fi, steps from the plaza, and churches. Or wait from one of our balconies for the aroma of roasted coffee from one of the nearby coffee makers.

Name: La Botánica Hotel
Description: A secret Eden in the heart of the city. Join us for a stay in one of our beautiful suites, a day of wellness, or dinner at our vegan dinner series.

Name: Hacienda Monte Rey
Description: Hacienda Monte Rey is a 40-acre private property in the town of Luquillo on the eastern side of Puerto Rico. The property is located in the Sierra mountains of Luquillo which shares the beautiful scenery of the El Yunque National Rainforest and the Sabana River that goes through the property. Hacienda Monte Rey is an example of Puerto Rico`s properties on how we can work to create farms, houses, and businesses with eco-energy sources and eco-friendly techniques.

Name: Finca Corsica
Description: Escape to a place that is unique, sustainable and perfectly balanced between two of the most beautiful views in our island: The Mountain & The Coast. Wake up to a Puerto Rican sunset that bathes your windows with golden lights, enjoy your morning with the smell and taste of freshly brewed Puerto Rican coffee and lay down after sunset to gaze upon the stars with the fresh sea breeze.

Name: Villa del Rio
Description: Villa del Rio is a short term rental vacation home just feet from the river where you can hear day and night. Villa del Rio is a concrete house with 3 bedroom, 2 full bathroom fully equipped house which is part of more than 40 acres of private property of rainforest.

Name: Aqua Marina Beach Club
Description: Aqua Marina Beach Club is offering a relaxing and romantic experience for adults only. The modern comfort rooms are equipped with one private parking, cable TV, Wi-Fi, and daily housekeeping with complimentary beach towels, beach chairs and umbrellas. you’ll have everything you need for your perfect Rincon beach vacation. Kick back in a lounge chair and enjoy a cool drink at the pool bar, or walk to the Black Eagle Marina Beach that is just steps away,

Name: Villa Tampico
Description: Villa Tampico is a very private property, but is closed to town. Is a unique property with access to water, snorkling, fishing. It has two private docks.

Name: La Cuchilla PR
Description: Welcome to La Receta de Toño. A small A-frame cabin with breathtaking views in the mountains of Aibonito. This place includes its own private bathroom and outdoor shower. It includes a charcoal bbq, fire pit, gas stoves, eating and cooking utensils, a queen bed, and a small loft above to enjoy the view. You will enjoy peace and tranquillity under starry nights and cool temperatures at night. We also have hiking trails and a lake for fishing on the property.

Name: Otium Rentals
Description: Otium provides professional short-term and vacation rental accommodations in Puerto Rico. We have carefully curated a group of amazing vacation stays so you can enjoy the Otium experience in your favorite leisure destinations. These consist of (example) you stay at our Airbnb and in the morning, we collect coffee in the same way as our ancestors, then we arrive at our coffee mill, and we do all the non-traditional and artisanal special coffee processes and even drink it in a cup. We also have tours of the farm, camping area, stream, waterfalls, spring and countless birds, reptiles, amphibians and native trees.

When people stay in the houses, they can tour the farm along trails along which they can observe birds, coffee plantations and spectacular views. A bird watcher from Cornell University conducted a bird census in which she was able to record 29 species of birds, 12 of them endemic. Unique things about the farm: - View of a large part of the north coast of PR where you can see mountains, hills and plains. - Walking trails.
